title: Tommy Jeans Ryan Slim Fit Jeans, Blue
501 Original Straight Jeans
description: The ones that started it all, Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans are the ultimate icon of American culture. Crafted from non-stretch, heavyweight 12 oz. cotton denim in a regular fit that's straight through the hip with a slightly tapered leg opening, their mid rise cut sits below the natural waist with a tilted waistband that pitches toward the front. Finished with a rich black rinse, this pair's classic five-pocket silhouette sports a signature button-fly and 17" leg opening. It’s best to wash denim as little as possible in order to prevent shrinking and fading. Delay washing your new jeans as long as you can, instead hanging them out on the washing line to air. When they are ready for a freshening up, turn jeans inside-out and wash separately in cold water and line dry, if possible. size W34/L32

title: Made in Italy Cashmere V-Neck Jumper
description: A cashmere piece should be something you treasure. And for this classic V-neck, we've partnered with artisans in a family-run factory in Northern Italy where they dye, spin and knit our cashmere to give you a true taste of luxury. Knitted in a mid-weight gauge with a ribbed knit neck, hem and cuffs, this jumper is an all-season all-star that's even machine washable. A luxurious layer to dress up or down. Specialist cashmere spinners in Italy use their extensive expertise to twist a finer, softer, more rounded yarn, giving a deeper colour when dyed. We blend three to four different hues to make just one colour, ensuring each shade has a richness to it. Our own-brand cashmere story starts on the other side of the world, in the region stretching from northern China into Mongolia, where goats survive the harsh winter by growing an extra-fine coat underneath their weather-resistant guard hair — this is where the cashmere comes from. The cold climate and hearty lifestyle of the animals produce the longest, finest, softest fibres: some of the best cashmere in the world. Our own-brand men's cashmere is 100% Sustainable Fibre Alliance certified.

title: Made in Italy Cashmere Crew Neck Jumper
description: A cashmere piece should be something you treasure. And for this classic crew neck, we've partnered with artisans in a family-run factory in Northern Italy where they dye, spin and knit our cashmere to give you a true taste of luxury. Knitted in a mid-weight gauge with a ribbed knit neck, hem and cuffs, this jumper is an all-season all-star that's even machine washable. A luxurious layer to dress up or down. Specialist cashmere spinners in Italy use their extensive expertise to twist a finer, softer, more rounded yarn, giving a deeper colour when dyed. We blend three to four different hues to make just one colour, ensuring each shade has a richness to it. Our own-brand cashmere story starts on the other side of the world, in the region stretching from northern China into Mongolia, where goats survive the harsh winter by growing an extra-fine coat underneath their weather-resistant guard hair — this is where the cashmere comes from. The cold climate and hearty lifestyle of the animals produce the longest, finest, softest fibres: some of the best cashmere in the world. Our own-brand men's cashmere is 100% Sustainable Fibre Alliance certified.

title: Milano Crew Neck Cotton Jumper
description: A crew-neck jumper rendered from supremely soft and breathable cotton for maximum comfort.

It's smart enough for commuting worn over tailoring but is also great for weekend walks in the country.

title: Polo Ralph Lauren Bi-Swing Water-Repellent Windbreaker Jacket
description: A real classic with timeless style, this Polo Ralph Lauren windbreaker is a fine addition to your casual wardrobe. It's fashioned from lightweight weather-resistant microfibre and fitted with a zip fastening for easy wear. Perfect for autumn days, the jacket has a tab fastening at the collar, 2 angled waist-hight pockets and an elasticated waistband for a more cinched-in fit.

description: Barbour International's heritage is intertwined with motorcycling and its Tarnett jacket also happens to be ideal for cruising along with the wind in your hair.

title: Sangro Men's Waterproof Jacket
description: You don't always need fussy details and loads of pockets. Sometimes you just want a really good waterproof jacket and that's exactly what the Sangro is. This shell is made from lightweight, two-layer DryVent™ with taped seams and a water repellent finish. All this means you stay dry, protected from the wind and won't get too hot and sweaty in the process - ideal when hiking in shifting conditions. Although this slim-fitting waterproof has a clean look, it does still have features you need when hiking in bad weather. Like a placket over the front zip. And the Velcro® cuffs, shock cord hem and adjustable, stowable hood - all to keep wind and rain out. The lining is soft mesh taffeta and your chin is protected from the zip with a smooth brushed-knit chin guard. Two hand pockets finish it all off nicely.

The quilted funnel collar creates a fashionable look and is lined with corduroy for a super-soft feel against the skin, while back waist tabs give an adjustable fit, allowing for essential winter layering. Robust stud fastenings help seal out wind and rain, and two front pockets offer plenty of room to carry essentials, with an additional zipped welt pocket to safeguard valuables.

The Phase has two zipped, map-sized pockets and an internal pocket - plenty of storage options for your trail essentials. The stiff peak on the hood will keep the rain out of your face.

title: Hooded Packable Jacket, Army Green

title: Made in Italy Cashmere V-Neck Jumper
description: A cashmere piece should be something you treasure. And for this classic V-neck, we've partnered with artisans in a family-run factory in Northern Italy where they dye, spin and knit our cashmere to give you a true taste of luxury. Knitted in a mid-weight gauge with a ribbed knit neck, hem and cuffs, this jumper is an all-season all-star that's even machine washable. A luxurious layer to dress up or down. Specialist cashmere spinners in Italy use their extensive expertise to twist a finer, softer, more rounded yarn, giving a deeper colour when dyed. We blend three to four different hues to make just one colour, ensuring each shade has a richness to it. Our own-brand cashmere story starts on the other side of the world, in the region stretching from northern China into Mongolia, where goats survive the harsh winter by growing an extra-fine coat underneath their weather-resistant guard hair — this is where the cashmere comes from. The cold climate and hearty lifestyle of the animals produce the longest, finest, softest fibres: some of the best cashmere in the world. Our own-brand men's cashmere is 100% Sustainable Fibre Alliance certified.

Rounded edges give it a softer, more subtle profile, while splayed legs play on Scandi-inspired design. We like how it showcases warm, natural wood grains throughout. Maximum user weight 120kg per bench. You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

title: John Lewis Wilton 2-4 Seater Extending Dining Table, Linen
description: If you have limited space in your home, there's no need to compromise on style or quality as the compact Wilton design is simple but timeless. Available in a painted and natural finish for a modern look that highlights the authentic wood grain. This small dining table has a centrally-stored extension to seat up to 4 people. You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

title: Laya 6 Seater Round Table, Natural
description: The simplicity and classic style of the 6-seater Laya table make it an effortless addition to a dining room or kitchen space. A beautifully hand-carved piece, the elegant base has a distinctive silhouette that is in harmonious balance with the generous proportions of the tabletop. The grain of the wood and naturally-occurring knots are highlighted in all their beauty with a raw finish that allows the subtle variations in tone, and the tactility of the wood to shine through. We find a circular table feels beautifully informal and creates easy, intimate gatherings.

title: Calia 8-12 Seater Extending Dining Table, Solid Oak
description: Made predominantly from solid American white oak, our Calia range of furniture has a natural, rustic look thanks to its wire-brushed, distressed finish. Each piece is made from individual wood slats that are carefully selected and sorted by skilled craftsman. They ensure that the natural pattern in the wood grain, even with its unique irregularities, uphold our design and quality standards, to offer an authentic and tactile look. This solid and sturdy dining table can be extended easily thanks to the extension leaves that are fixed to both ends. Providing seating for up to 12 diners at its full extension, it's supported by a robust, welded iron base that's finished with a durable lacquer. The extension leaves must be stored separately when not in use. Striking and functional in design, this table will sit well amongst industrial-inspired settings. Oak is a natural, living material, and part of its charm is that it develops over time. This means that surface splits may start to appear with the natural movement of the wood. Knots will vary in size and location and a subtle colour variation can also be expected. These distinctive qualities give the range a unique feel, as no two pieces will be exactly the same. To keep your furniture looking its best, we recommend periodic oiling and oiling before first use. This is applicable to the Oak version only, as the Dark version has a lacquered finish. More information can be found in the assembly instructions supplied. You may want to see and get a feel for the furniture in one of our shops before ordering. If you do plan on doing this we recommend giving us a call on 03452 661805 as not all our ranges are on display in our shops. We'll be able to tell you where the range you'd like to view is on display.

title: Doris CL257 LED Bathroom Ceiling Light, Chrome
description: This functional ceiling light is IP44 rated and resistant to moisture, so you can install it in bathrooms, kitchens and balconies. Designed with powerful LED technology to provide a warm glow of light.

title: Sorrento 3 Arm Ceiling Light
description: This timeless light fitting is ideal in living spaces and dining rooms, and it's suspended from a height-adjustable chain. Made from metal in a polished or satin finish, it's designed with a smart drum lampshade that encases three lights. The lampshade is made from slubbed linen and lined with a metallic inner to enhance a warm glow of light. Adding extra finesse, the ceiling rose has a stepped design that gives the fitting an Art-Deco inspired touch. Three LED bulbs are required.

title: Blackwell Glass Ceiling Light, Brass
description: Laura Ashley’s Blackwell glazed, lantern-style ceiling light will be a real feature in your hallway or living room. It comprises of small panels of clear glass, the edges of which are encased with thin metal strips, with an antique brass finish, forming a distinctive geometric shape. The glass is bevelled for a luxurious, quality look. Suspended by a chain, the height of this light can be adjusted when it is installed. Bulb not included.

title: Magnolia Pendant Ceiling Light, Antique Brass
description: Inspired by the beautiful magnolia tree in full bloom, our Magnolia ceiling light is a graceful and versatile lighting pendant that seamlessly blends classic aesthetics with modern functionality. This pendant features a brass finish that infuses timeless charm and sophistication into your decor. Its glass shade is a study in contrast, with a glossy white exterior for a contemporary twist, while the frosted interior diffuses a soft and inviting glow. With a compact 9-inch (23cm) diameter shade and a beige fabric-covered cord, the Magnolia pendant adds elegance to a room.

title: Champagne Bubble Glass Bar Ceiling Light, Champagne/Warm Brass
description: This six light statement bar pendant will add the wow factor to your kitchen or dining room. Made from bubble glass with an opalescent finish that will cast shadows and create a subtle textured effect. Warm brass hardware lends a smart touch, finished with a twisted fabric flex.

title: Shan CL253 LED Motion Sensor Ceiling Light, White
description: Adaptable, functional and energy-saving, thanks to an integrated LED, this fixture can be mounted to the ceiling or wall. It's equipped with motion sensor technology with a wide detection range, so you'll have instant lighting whenever you enter or leave the room. It offers shades of warm white light.

title: Rodos Semi Flush Ceiling Light, Antique Brass
description: The Rodos Semi Flush Ceiling Light is an elegant and versatile lighting fixture that effortlessly combines classic design with modern sophistication. This semi-flush mount is ideal for rooms with lower ceilings and features an Antique Brass finish that adds a touch of vintage charm to your decor. Its glass shade is a study in contrast, with a glossy white exterior that exudes contemporary style, while the frosted interior diffuses a soft and inviting glow. A compact yet impactful addition to any room.

title: Baroque Easy-to-Fit Ceiling Shade, Blue
description: Easy to fit, this ceiling shade will seamlessly attach to your existing light fitting for an instant refresh to your space.

title: Leighton Easy-to-Fit Bubble Glass Ceiling Shade
description: This bubble glass and brass finish shade softly diffuses the light and will be perfect for use in a hallway. Easy to fit, this ceiling shade will seamlessly attach to your existing light fitting for an instant refresh to your space.

title: Tameo LED Semi Flush 3 Arm Ceiling Light, Chrome
description: Thoroughly modern, this flush ceiling light features three swirling arms finished in a contemporary chrome. Each arm is completed with an opal glass disc-shaped shade. Fitted with LED bulbs, this light offers low maintenance costs, cool running temperature with low energy consumption and a high light output.

title: Textured Glass Hall Pendant Ceiling Light, Antique Brass
description: Created using bespoke ribbed glass tiles, the Textured Glass Hall Pendant has a contemporary faceted look. It's complemented with warm brass-plated metal work in an antique finish and a soft gold braided cable.

title: Amelie Ribbed Glass Ceiling Light Shade
description: Attach this shade to your existing ceiling light for a vintage-style look. Made from glass with ribbed detailing that creates texture and beautifully diffuses the light. Suitable for E27/ES and B22/BC fittings.

title: Whitham Fluted Glass Ceiling Pendant Light, Antique Brass
description: The Laura Ashley Whitham pendant light features a fluted solid glass shade, with a gold-toned twisted fabric cable and antique brass metalwork. Perfect for a retro style of decor in a stairway or the dining room.

title: Rattan Scallop Semi Flush Ceiling Light, Natural
description: Delicate and beautifully rippled, the Rattan Scallop semi-flush ceiling light blends warm, natural woven rattan with elegant brass metalwork accents. Perfectly balancing modern and classic styles, it brings a cosy, timeless charm to bedrooms and dining spaces alike. The semi-flush design is particularly suitable for spaces with lower ceilings.

title: John Lewis Small Libby Easy-to-Fit Ceiling Shade, Cream
description: This shade is designed to attach to your existing light fitting. A diffuser at the base adds texture and softens the light, while also concealing any unsightly bulbs. You can also use it as a table lamp shade as it has a shade reducer, so it can be installed with an E14 or E27 lamp type, but the diffuser will have to be removed.

title: Libby Easy-to-Fit Ceiling Shade, Natural
description: Easy to fit, this ceiling shade will seamlessly attach to your existing light fitting for an instant refresh to your space.

title: Ascoli Single Spotlight, White
description: With its compact proportions and lightly textured finish, this spotlight is a functional choice for any room, particularly hallways and kitchens, or darker areas of your home. Its robust knuckle joint pivots smoothly, so you can cast a bright and even glow exactly where needed. Minimalist and unobtrusive, it's made from durable steel and it's dimmable when used with the recommended GU10 LED bulb.

title: White and Colour Ambiance Surimu Smart LED Rectangle Panel Ceiling Light with Bluetooth, White
description: This LED-integrated panel sits flush to the ceiling and will transform your room with coloured light. This light works with the free Philips Hue Bluetooth app. Simply install it and connect straight away to the Bluetooth app for instant, smart lighting control from anywhere in your home. You can add up to 10 smart lights on to one mobile device. Choose from shades of warm-to-cool white light or use millions of colours of light to transform your space. This allows you to create the perfect ambience and choose the best light levels throughout the day, and around your activities. Cool-toned, bright-white daylight is best at the start of the day as it helps to energise your body and mind. A soft glow of warm white light is better in the evening and will help you to unwind and relax. Control this light with simple voice commands. Philips Hue works with Alexa and the Google Assistant when paired with a compatible device. To experience the full potential of this smart light, connect to a Philips Hue Bridge (optional extra, available to purchase separately). Additional Philips Hue features include: setting timers and routines with light, controlling your lights remotely and automating your entire smart home lighting set up. There's also the option to add other accessories, including motion sensors and smart switches.

title: Basic Ceiling Pendant Cord, White
description: This simple pendant cord is ideal for modern settings and can be adjusted to perfectly suit your space. It's easy to attach to any non-wired, easy-to-fit lampshade or can be teamed with a large, feature bulb for a more industrial-inspired lighting solution.

title: Ockley Glass Semi Flush Ceiling Light, Polished Chrome
description: Style and functionality combine on the Ockley Glass Semi Flush Ceiling Light from Laura Ashley. Its warm, ambient glow elevates a room from within the glass shade. The light sits semi-flush to the ceiling with polished chrome metalwork.

title: John Lewis Elio 3 Arm Ceiling Light
description: Install this simple ceiling light in hallways, or rooms with a low ceiling, and enjoy an impressive spread of light around your space. Its three arms feature frosted glass shades that ensure the light is warm, without being too harsh. Great for a quick room refresh.

title: Classic Cable Set Bayonet Cap Fitting
Rufus Ceiling Light
description: This cone-shaped pendant is available in a painted, antique or polished metal finish so you can pick the style that works best with your decor. Industrial-inspired, with matching fittings and engineered details, it's height-adjustable at the point of installation and looks impressive when installed separately or in a line of three. Try installing it directly above a dining table or kitchen island and enjoy a direct glow of light. One LED bulb is required.

title: Sauvage Spray Eau de Toilette
description: The UK'S best-selling fragrance.* A radically fresh composition, dictated by a name that has the ring of a manifesto. That was the way François Demachy, DIOR Perfumer-Creator, wanted it: raw and noble all at once. Natural ingredients, selected with extreme care, prevail in excessive doses. Radiant top notes burst with the juicy freshness of Reggio di Calabria Bergamot. Ambroxan, derived from precious ambergris, unleashes a powerfully woody trail. It is an act of creation inspired by wide-open spaces. An ozone-blue sky sprawled above a rocky landscape, white-hot beneath the desert sun. Now refillable, the 100ml bottle of Sauvage Eau de Toilette is part of the House of Dior's eco-design initiative. *Based on NPD Full Year 2024 in value.

title: Peony & Blush Suede Cologne
description: The essence of charm. Peonies in voluptuous bloom, exquisitely fragile. Flirtatious with the juicy bite of red apple and the opulence of jasmine, rose and gillyflower. Mingling with the sensuality of soft, blush suede. Luxurious and seductive. How to use: Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck and pulse points – your body heat will help to diffuse the fragrance as the day goes on. Wear alone or layer with another Cologne or your favourite Bath & Body products. Looking to find your new favourite scent in person? Visit our Jo Malone London boutiques inside selected John Lewis & Partners shops:

title: Wood Sage & Sea Salt Cologne, 9ml
description: Escape the every day along the windswept shore. Waves breaking white, the air fresh with sea salt and spray. Alive with the mineral scent of the rugged cliffs. Mingling with the woody earthiness of sage. Lively, spirited and totally joyful. Fragrance notes: Ambrette Seeds, Sea Salt, Sage. How to use: Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck and pulse points -your body heat will help to diffuse the fragrance as the day goes on. Wear alone or layer with another Cologne or your favourite Bath & Body products. Looking to find your new favourite scent in person? Visit our Jo Malone London boutiques inside selected John Lewis & Partners shops:

title: Aventus Eau de Parfum
description: Exude confidence and strength with Aventus, a famed fragrance for men that embodies The House of Creed’s inimitability in the world of perfumery. Crafted to mark the house’s 250th anniversary, this rich Eau de Parfum opens with a tantalising burst of hand-picked Calabrian bergamot, zesty lemon and pink pepper, before giving way to a fruity, floral heart of luscious pineapple, sweet jasmine and patchouli. Woody notes of oakmoss, cedarwood and The House of Creed’s signature ingredient, ambroxan, masterfully combine at the base, leaving a lingering impression of timeless sophistication. The flacon is presented without a spray to enable you to decant it into a Creed atomiser.

title: Peony & Blush Suede Cologne, 9ml
description: The essence of charm. Peonies in voluptuous bloom, exquisitely fragile. Flirtatious with the juicy bite of red apple and the opulence of jasmine, rose and gillyflower. Mingling with the sensuality of soft, blush suede. Luxurious and seductive. Fragrance notes: Red Apple, Peony, Suede. How to use: Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck and pulse points -your body heat will help to diffuse the fragrance as the day goes on. Wear alone or layer with another Cologne or your favourite Bath & Body products. Looking to find your new favourite scent in person? Visit our Jo Malone London boutiques inside selected John Lewis & Partners shops:

title: Spicebomb Extreme Eau de Parfum
description: Experience a sensory explosion with Spicebomb Extreme, the intense Eau de Parfum for men by Viktor & Rolf. Spicebomb Extreme reveals an intense explosion of heat in a fragrance. The sparkling grapefruit top notes are enhanced by notes of pimento berries along with black pepper to deliver a fresh opening. The aromatic heart is surrounded by the scent of warm spices; cumin, cinnamon and saffron, giving it a masculine yet sensual personality. The note of tobacco is strengthened by the balsamic notes of vanilla and bourbon which are contrasted with warm woody amber for an oriental experience. Spicebomb Extreme Eau de Parfum is available in 50ml and 90ml. Fragrance family: Ambery Spicy. Fragrance notes: How to use: For instant infatuation, spritz the perfume onto the pulse points (on wrists, behind ears and on neck).

title: Black Orchid Eau de Parfum
description: A luxurious and sensual fragrance of rich, dark accords and an alluring potion of black orchids, and spice, Tom Ford’s Black Orchid is both modern and timeless. Bottled in fluted, black glass, Black Orchid makes an unforgettable statement of iconic style and worldly glamour. How to use: On clean skin, spray once or twice on desired areas. Do not rub the fragrance on the skin, as this will alter how the fragrance develops.

title: Lime Basil & Mandarin Cologne, 9ml
description: Float away on a cool tropical breeze. Peppery basil and aromatic white thyme bring an unexpected twist to the scent of limes. A modern classic. Fragrance notes: Mandarin, Basil, Amberwood. How to use: Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck and pulse points -your body heat will help to diffuse the fragrance as the day goes on. Wear alone or layer with another Cologne or your favourite Bath & Body products. Looking to find your new favourite scent in person? Visit our Jo Malone London boutiques inside selected John Lewis & Partners shops:

title: Eau Sauvage Deodorant Spray, 150ml
description: 24-hour effectiveness with a real sensation of freshness, comfort and softness. It protects the skin by preventing dehydration, without leaving marks on clothing. Available in an alcohol-free stick or spray. 150ml

title: Portrait Of A Lady Eau de Parfum
description: A baroque, sumptuous and symphonic perfume that required hundreds of trials to balance such an expressive formula, Portrait of a Lady is undoubtedly the perfume containing the strongest dosage of rose essence and patchouli heart. Dominique Ropion composed a rose amber, based on an accord of benzoin, cinnamon, sandalwood, and, above all patchouli, musk and frankincense. A perfume evocative of sensuous beauty, that attracts people like a magnet. A modern classic.

title: Sauvage Eau de Parfum
description: The UK's best-selling fragrance franchise.* Dior Sauvage Eau de Parfum is the men's fragrance inspired by the desert at sundown. For Sauvage Eau de Parfum, the House of Dior has selected an exceptional vanilla from Papua New Guinea. It diffuses a delicious exotic quality over a woody, ambery base, imbuing Sauvage with sensual accents. A moment tinted with a thick blue, when the coolness of the night mixes with the desert heat. The 100ml bottle of Sauvage Eau de Parfum is now refillable, becoming part of the sustainable development initiative from the House of Dior. *Based on NPD Full Year 2024 in value.

title: Cologne Discovery Fragrance Gift Set
description: Find a new favourite with five trial-sized scents. Contains mellow English Pear & Freesia, flirtatious Peony & Blush Suede, fresh Wood Sage & Sea Salt, zesty Lime Basil & Mandarin and seductive Pomegranate Noir. Each can be worn solo or layered with another as a Scent Pairing. Looking to find your new favourite scent in person? Visit our Jo Malone London boutiques inside selected John Lewis & Partners shops:

title: Eau Sauvage Eau De Toilette Spray
description: The quintessentially French classic since its creation, DIOR’s first men’s perfume remains revolutionary for its simple audacity. Its world-class composition offers a perfect blend of crisp citrus notes and distinctly masculine woody undertones; an eternal favorite.

title: Another 13 Eau de Parfum
description: In 2010, Le Labo was commissioned by AnOther Magazine to work on an exclusive scent. This project was born thanks to Sarah of colette who initiated the creative collaboration between Le Labo and Jefferson Hack, editor-in-chief of AnOther Magazine. The result of this collaboration is AnOther 13, a hypnotising and unique scent. It’s composed of ambroxan, a synthetic animal musk, making AnOther 13 an addictive dirty potion blended with twelve other ingredients such as jasmine, moss and ambrette seeds absolute - which gives it spike and shine. As the entire planet knows, colette closed their doors December 2017, but luckily we were able to welcome AnOther 13 to our classic collection in our labs worldwide.

title: Sauvage Elixir
description: The UK's best-selling fragrance franchise.* Sauvage Elixir is the Dior fragrance with a unique* and extreme concentration, like the quintessence of Sauvage. This fragrance for men unleashes an unexpected and surprising scent trail with notes of Grapefruit, Spices, organic AOP Lavender and sweet, smooth Woods. It is an olfactory composition with astonishing strength that explores uncharted territory. The Sauvage Elixir fragrance boldly reinterprets the iconic freshness of Sauvage by embracing a trail with new custom-crafted facets. Woody, fresh or spicy: each olfactory note of the fragrance exults, explodes, grips and engulfs. *At Dior. *Based on NPD Full Year 2024 in value.

title: Jo Malone Cologne and Cologne Intense Discovery Collection Fragrance Gift Set
description: Find a new favourite with five trial-sized scents. Contains mellow English Pear & Freesia, flirtatious Peony & Blush Suede, fresh Wood Sage & Sea Salt, sensuous Myrrh & Tonka and hypnotic Oud & Bergamot. Each can be worn solo or layered with another as a Scent Pairing. 5 x 1.5ml. Looking to find your new favourite scent in person? Visit our Jo Malone London boutiques inside selected John Lewis & Partners shops:

title: Bleu De CHANEL Eau De Parfum Spray
description: A tribute to masculine freedom in an aromatic-woody fragrance with a captivating trail. A timeless, powerful fragrance housed in an enigmatic blue bottle. The uncompromising spirit of BLEU DE CHANEL conveyed in an Eau de Parfum for men. A more intense olfactory signature to assert ones own individuality. BLEU DE CHANEL Eau de Parfum, an aromatic-woody fragrance with amber and musky notes. A sensual interpretation in which amber dry cedar notes lend sensuality and voluptuousness. The musky woody notes and New Caledonian Sandalwood add elegance and depth. The aromatic-woody notes of BLEU DE CHANEL find expression in a full range of shaving and body products.

title: Men's Sample Inspiration Fragrance Gift Set
description: The House of Creed Sample Inspiration Sets allow you to explore some of the finest fragrances for men and women from the comfort of your home and help you ensure you pick the right fragrance the first time round while shopping online.

title: Sauvage Deodorant Spray, 150ml
Bleu de CHANEL Eau de Toilette Spray
description: A tribute to masculine freedom in an aromatic-woody fragrance with a captivating trail. A timeless, anti-conformist fragrance housed in an enigmatic blue bottle. The meeting of strength and elegance. This aromatic-woody fragrance unites the invigorating freshness of citrus and the strength of an aromatic accord with the woody whisper of dry cedar notes. New Caledonian Sandalwood lends it a warm and sensual trail.

title: Velvet Rose & Oud Cologne Intense, 9ml
description: Celebrating the eternal beauty and versatility of a revered flower. The iconic floralcy of Damask rose wrapped in the smoky depths of oud, sparked with clove and a delicious taste of praline. Magnetic and decadent. How to use: Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck and pulse points - your body heat will help to diffuse the fragrance as the day goes on. Wear alone or layer with another Cologne or your favourite Bath & Body products. Looking to find your new favourite scent in person? Visit our Jo Malone London boutiques inside selected John Lewis & Partners shops:

title: Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum
description: Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum is a flowery fragrance with amber and woody notes, born from the encounter between Maison Francis Kurkdjian and Baccarat to celebrate the crystal manufacturer’s 250th birthday. Unique amongst woody floral fragrances, this scent releases a poetic alchemy, a highly condensed and graphic olfactory signature. Breezy jasmine facets, radiant saffron boost the ambergris mineral notes and the woody tones of freshly-cut cedar. Bright and sleek, the soft floral fragrance of Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum caresses the skin like an amber and woody flowered whisper. To enjoy a moment of well-being and prolong the sillage of your fragrance, add these other Baccarat Rouge 540 scented creations and their distinctive floral musk fragrance to your beauty ritual: hand and body cleansing gel, body oil, hair mist and solid soap. Olfactory family: woody ambery floral.

title: English Pear & Freesia Cologne, 9ml
description: The essence of autumn. The sensuous freshness of just-ripe pears is wrapped in a bouquet of bright white freesias, and mellowed by amber, patchouli and woods. Luscious and golden. Fragrance notes: William Pear, Freesia, Patchouli. Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck and pulse points - your body heat will help to diffuse the fragrance as the day goes on. Wear alone or layer with another Cologne or your favourite Bath & Body products. Looking to find your new favourite scent in person? Visit our Jo Malone London boutiques inside selected John Lewis & Partners shops:

title: Signature Discovery Fragrance Gift Set, 6 x 1.5ml
description: Discover timeless Signature scents with modern impact in travel-ready 1.5ml sizes. Black Orchid Eau de Parfum: A deep floral fragrance featuring notes of black truffle, black orchid, and patchouli. Noir Extreme Eau de Parfum: A woody scent infused with mandarin oil, amber and sandalwood accords. Ombré Leather Eau De Parfum: A Rustic Eau De Parfum powered by notes of cardamom, jasmine sambac and black leather. Eau De Soleil Blanc Eau de Toilette: A sunny scent enriched with orange bitter, ylang ylang and coco de Mer accords. Costa Azzurra Eau de Parfum: An aromatic perfume featuring lemon, cypress oil and amber nuances. Grey Vetiver Eau de Parfum: A refined fragrance imbued with notes of grapefruit, nutmeg, and oak moss.

title: Beautiful Skin Foundation
description: "Darlings, my new Beautiful Skin Foundation gives everyone skin that looks beautifully hydrated, plumper, smoother and brighter! This medium coverage, hydrating foundation has been expertly formulated with skincare ingredients to combine instant glow and buildable coverage with long-term skincare benefits. With brightening Rose Complex and hydrating Hyaluronic Acid to improve the look of skin with each wear*, my new Beautiful Skin Foundation is the secret to your best, healthy-looking skin day, every day!" Charlotte Tilbury. 1 Neutral is the perfect shade for you if you have very fair skin with neutral undertones. Discover The Clinically-Proven Results... *312 people tested daily over 4 weeks. **Tested on 33 people over 4 weeks. Bix’Activ™ and Hyalurosmooth™ are trademarks by BASF Beauty Care Solutions France SAS.

title: Hollywood Flawless Filter Mini
description: "Darlings, get your glow on the go with my new mini Hollywood Flawless Filter! Inspired by the perfecting properties of social media and the illuminating effects of Hollywood lights, it blurs, smooths and illuminates for the most magical glow of your life! "My mini Hollywood Flawless Filter is available in 4 shades, and 3 Fair is a warm peach shade that’s perfect for light to medium skin tones." Charlotte Tilbury. What makes it magic: **300 women tested over 1 week. ***Tested on 16 people.

title: Lip Cheat Lip Liner Pencil
description: Lip Cheat is a rich, velvety lip liner that glides effortlessly over the lips and has the power to completely re-shape, re-size and balance lips. Always match lip liner to your K.I.S.S.I.N.G lipstick shade to perfect your lip shape and make lipstick stay in place from desk 'til dusk. What makes it magic?

title: Le Rouge Duo Ultra Tenue Ultra Wear Liquid Lip Colour
description: The perfect duo for lips with lasting mirror shine. A practical and modern dual formula. On one side, an intense liquid lip colour. On the other, a shiny and comfortable gloss. Result: high-shine impact that lasts over 8 hours* after the first application. *Clinical evaluation by a panel of 20 women.

title: Benetint Rose Tinted Lip and Cheek Stain
description: The sexiest flush you can get from a bottle! This iconic rose-tinted lip stain was created for an exotic dancer in the 1970s and has since soared to cult-fave status. Our precise lip applicator glides right on lips and blends over cheeks for a gorgeous look in seconds and the kiss-proof colour lasts for hours. It’s loved by celebs, makeup artists and gals around the world.

title: Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray, 34ml
description: Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray weightlessly primes and sets for up to 16 hours* for the perfect-looking makeup day, every day. Instantly lock in your look with this hydrating setting spray for makeup magic that looks ‘just applied’! This delicately scented, long-lasting, next-generation setting spray is a magical beauty amplifier inspired by the smoothing, pore-blurring effects of the world-famous Airbrush makeup family. The high-performance formula works in harmony with your complexion-perfecting foundation, concealer, bronzer and powder to create a weightless veil of hydration and a flawless-looking finish! No melting, no fading, no creasing.

title: Hypnôse Mascara Up to 17x More Lash Volume Christmas Makeup Gift Set
description: Celebrate the magic of the holidays with the Lancôme Hypnôse Mascara, Bi-Facil Eye Makeup Remover and Absolu Rouge Cream 196 Mini Set, a limited-edition collection designed to deliver bold, voluminous lashes, iconic red lips, and effortless makeup removal. Whether you’re gifting or treating yourself, this pink-packaged set brings together Lancôme’s most beloved essentials for a glamorous holiday look from day to night. Featuring the full-size Hypnôse Mascara for up to 17x more lash volume, this set is complemented by the gentle yet powerful Bi-Facil Eye Makeup Remover and the Absolu Rouge Cream 196 Mini Lipstick in a universally flattering red. A complete eye and lip makeup set for the holidays that delivers bold, volumised lashes, a vibrant red lip, and effortless makeup removal, perfect for creating glamorous, festive looks with ease.

title: Double Wear Stay-in-Place Foundation SPF 10
description: Double Wear Stay-in-Place Makeup SPF 10. Over 60 shades. 24-hour staying power. The #1 prestige foundation in the UK.* Wear confidence with Double Wear Makeup and stay flawless for whatever comes your way. With 24-hour wear, this fresh matte, oil-free makeup controls oil all day. It’s sweat-, heat- and humidity-resistant, waterproof, lifeproof and 24-hour colour true. It comes in a wide range of shades that flatters all and it won’t look grey on deeper skin tones. It unifies uneven skin tone and covers imperfections with buildable, medium-to-full coverage that feels lightweight and so comfortable, you won’t believe it’s long wear. Double Wear is the makeup that keeps up - no matter where your day takes you. Apply it once and don’t think twice. No touchups needed. Find your perfect shade: Choose your skin’s intensity level (from light to deep) and undertone (cool, neutral or warm). How to determine your undertone: Undertone is the way your bare skin looks and behaves. Which one sounds most like you?

title: Hypnôse Mascara
description: Our Iconic Hypnôse mascara offering volume control in a new luxurious packaging. Go as bold, or natural as you desire with every stroke. The SoftSculpt ™ formula is enriched in ProVitamin B5 and leaves lashes feeling soft and supple. Create day-to-evening looks with this buildable mascara, and achieve up to 8 times the volume. Tested under ophthalmological control. Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers. *Consumer test on a panel of 58 women. How to apply: Place brush at the root of your lashes and gently comb from the root to the tip with a zigzag motion.

title: Hollywood Flawless Filter
description: Hollywood Flawless Filter for a superstar youth glow. A new revolutionary category in makeup, Hollywood Flawless Filter is a customisable, complexion booster, that gives everyone super starlit skin in seconds. It has the versatility of a primer, the mega-watt glow of a highlighter, and the perfecting properties of your favourite digital filter. Beneath it, blend it, boost it, bling it. Find your glow filter now! This genius new filter complements Light Wonder Foundation in all shades 1-10 and Magic Foundation in shades 1-12. *300 women tested over 1 week. **Tested on 16 people.

title: Sumptuous Extreme Mascara, Onyx
description: Lashes seem to multiply, magnify, grow to extremes. Sumptuous Extreme creates outrageous volume, lift and curves for an audacious, false-lash effect. Eyes look brighter, wider, more seductive. Extreme Bold Volume™ formula is a blend of three high-volume fibres in a mousse-light base. The formula acts almost like lash extensions, multiplying and growing the look of lashes. Fortified with conditioning Lash-Advancing Vitamin Complex. The BrushComber Extreme™ has two types of bristles: flexible fibres to carry maximum formula; solid fibres to comb and separate for separated definition.

title: Radiant Creamy Concealer, Chantilly
description: Iconic for a reason. Discover Radiant Creamy Concealer; the #1 best-selling prestige concealer in the U.K.* It brightens. Corrects. Perfects. All day long. Coveted by artists and non-artists alike for its long-lasting, luxurious and luminous finish; one swipe delivers 16-hour perfection for all skin tones. Glide on to instantly disguise blemishes, fine lines and signs of fatigue. Enriched with hydrating ingredients to plump. Powered by Light Diffusing Technology to blur imperfections. With medium, buildable coverage, Radiant Creamy Concealer puts artist-grade correcting in your hands. Conceal, highlight and contour your way to radiant skin. Available in 30 shades. Top tip: To find your perfect shade match, blend along the jawline and allow concealer to dry down on the skin. Shades may vary slightly across formulas depending on coverage and finish. *Source: The NPD Group, Ltd, Prestige Concealer Subsegment, 12 months ending December 2021, value & unit sales.

title: Quickliner for Eyes
description: Long-wearing, transfer-resistant eye pencil with a unique smudge-tip at one end. Smooth, easy, effortless. Won't tug delicate eyelids. Colour wears for hours. Line can be softened for a "smokey" look. Self-sharpening; propels only. Water-resistant. Ophthalmologist tested. Line the eye using long strokes to achieve a defined eye. Use sponge tip if "smoky" look is required.

title: Magic Vanish Colour Corrector, Fair
description: Dark circles? Pigmentation? Shadows? Tired-looking eyes? Puffiness? "Darlings, my Magic Vanish Colour Corrector is the solution!" Charlotte Tilbury MBE. These under-eye brightening and pigmentation correctors glide on with a buttery, feather-light texture, neutralising, smoothing and lifting the look of your skin, reducing the look of puffiness and concealing the appearance of dark circles, pigmentation, shadows and imperfections for a wide-awake, flawless-looking complexion. Infused with skincare ingredients, they blend effortlessly into the skin without creasing or settling into fine lines and wrinkles.

title: Exagger-Eyes Mascara
description: Charlotte’s secret to 28-hour exaggerated volume + curl. "Bigger! thicker! longer! The bigger the better, darlings! Your search for the one ends here. Exagger-Eyes Volume Mascara gives 9x more volume in just one coat. "Sparse or thick, long or short, curly or straight, whatever your lash type, my ultra-curved lash styler brush grips and separates every lash for instant root-to-tip volume and curl." Charlotte Tilbury, MBE. Benefits: What makes it magic? Lash Vinyl-Black Wrap Tech: Ultra-Curved Lash Styler Brush: Results: *Tested on 105 people over 7 days. How to use: Magic removal:

title: Vitamin Enriched Face Base
description: What it is: Skincare made for makeup. Our bestselling multivitamin-enriched moisturising primer for the face instantly nourishes, plumps, and preps skin with healthy hydration to improve the look of foundation. It’s full makeup prep in one step, blending the performance of a primer with the cushion of a face moisturiser. Who it's for: Normal to oily skin types. Benefits: A blend of Vitamins B, C, and E helps replenish and condition skin with essential nourishment. A moisturising complex of Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, and Shea Butter helps instantly hydrate, plump, and prep skin for a fresh, healthy-looking glow. Rich yet lightweight and fast-absorbing texture cushions skin and grips foundation for smooth, flawless makeup application. Grapefruit and Geranium leave a light, uplifting scent on skin. Real Results:* *Consumer testing on 123 women after 1 week of product use.

title: Pillow Talk Push Up Lashes Mascara
description: "Pillow Talk Push Up Lashes is my new lash innovation and the secret to instant length, weightless volume, stretch and a 24-hour vertical life effect for the lashes of your dreams! It’s mascara confidence. Pillow Talk Push Up Lashes is your beauty amplifier to make your eyes look bigger, brighter and more awake! Make your eye colour pop and create the perfect Pillow Talk lash; the glossiest, lifted, defined, stretch-effect, separated, voluminous, beautiful lashes." Charlotte Tilbury. 3 Pillow Talk beauty icons sold every minute.* *Based on global sales figures for Pillow Talk single products from March 2019 -February 2020. What makes it magic: *Blind tested on 31 people after one application. Kerestore™ is a Trade Mark of the Croda Group of Companies.

title: Touche Éclat Illuminating Pen
description: The iconic face illuminator and #1 essential for your makeup bag. YSL’s most iconic product delivering 8 hours of beauty sleep in a click! Touche Éclat Illuminating Pen instantly helps to brighten your best facial features without shimmer or glitter, giving a natural, luminous finish. Our light-diffusing technology adds light and radiance to the fact. Apply to areas where there is natural shadow or depth to illuminate and improve dullness or reduce the signs of fatigue. It makes your face appear more vibrant and healthy – consider it your secret weapon to conquer the art of complexion. Eyes: Use around the eye area to add light and to help with the appearance of dullness or dark circles for a bright-eyed appearance. Mouth: Use on smile lines to bring natural light into dark creases around the mouth. Lips: Use on the cupid’s bow to give the appearance of plumpness and volume to the lips. Face: Use on cheekbones and brow bones to highlight your features for a natural sculpting effect. This product is not a concealer, it brings light to the skin. It should therefore not be used to cover blemishes or conceal uneven skin tone. For a radiant high coverage concealer use our Touche Éclat High Cover Concealer. For a beautifully radiant complexion, start with Touche Éclat Blur Primer and Touche Éclat Le Teint Foundation.

title: DayWear Sheer Tint Release Advanced Multi-Protection Anti-Oxidant Moisturiser SPF 15, 50ml
description: It’s the most important thing you’ll put on today. This lightweight tinted moisturiser enhances any skin tone with a healthy, even-toned glow. Plus it defends against the appearance of signs of premature aging with our most effective anti-oxidant power ever. Reduces the appearance of first signs of ageing, like dullness and fine, dry lines. Skin feels smoother, looks fresher instantly. Wear Daywear and feel confident in your beautiful skin.

title: Skin Illusion Tinted Moisturiser SPF 25
description: Not Just A Tinted Moisturiser. This 94% skincare formula is enriched with active ingredients, carefully selected for their skin-boosting properties. Skin Illusion Tinted Moisturiser instantly boosts skin’s radiance by +95%* and hydrates skin for 24 hours whilst its age-defying formula reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles by -24%**. The lightweight, dewy texture instantly evens the complexion, blurring the appearance of fine lines, pores and imperfections. Available in 11 versatile shades. *Self-assessment on skin with make-up, 102 women, 28 days of use. **Self-evaluation on bare skin: 102 women, 28 days of use

title: Double Wear Stay-in-Place 24-Hour Concealer, 0.5N
description: Flawless your way: Multi-use skin perfecting 24-hour concealer. Conceals, sculpts, enhances. Blurs imperfections for a soft-focus matte finish. Hydrates on contact. Hollow spheres absorb up to 5X their own weight—this concealer provides powerful oil control immediately and for up to 24 hours. High-performance, featherweight formula melts onto skin. Flexible, weightless, breathable wear. Medium to full coverage concealer. Powerful results: 3D Sculpting Wand: Expertly designed for targeted, multi-use application so you can define and own your look with precision and control. Key ingredients: Coverage: Medium to full-coverage concealer. Finish: Soft-focus, natural matte. Formula facts: How to use:

title: Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum
description: Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum is a flowery fragrance with amber and woody notes, born from the encounter between Maison Francis Kurkdjian and Baccarat to celebrate the crystal manufacturer’s 250th birthday. Unique amongst woody floral fragrances, this scent releases a poetic alchemy, a highly condensed and graphic olfactory signature. Breezy jasmine facets, radiant saffron boost the ambergris mineral notes and the woody tones of freshly-cut cedar. Bright and sleek, the soft floral fragrance of Baccarat Rouge 540 Eau de Parfum caresses the skin like an amber and woody flowered whisper. To enjoy a moment of well-being and prolong the sillage of your fragrance, add these other Baccarat Rouge 540 scented creations and their distinctive floral musk fragrance to your beauty ritual: hand and body cleansing gel, body oil, hair mist and solid soap. Olfactory family: woody ambery floral.

title: Good Girl Blush Eau de Parfum
description: Good Girl Blush Eau de Parfum is a fresh, floral explosion of femininity housed in a delicate blush-pink stiletto. Good Girl Blush Eau de Parfum contrasts two different extractions of a sensual vanilla base with the romanticism of a Peony heart – formed by two distinct forms of exotic Ylang Ylang and upcycled rosewater. To create this vegan formula, we've partnered with perfume industry leaders Givaudan and their sustainability program, Sourcing4Good to benefit the lives of the workers who source ingredients. Good Girl Blush features sustainably sourced vanilla and ylang-ylang. The bottle: The iconic Good Girl stiletto is given fresh romance in a delicate pastel-pink hue that's contrasted with an empowered gold stiletto heel. Olfactive Family: Ambery Floral Fruity. The Fragrance: Blooming and Powdery.

title: Miss Dior Essence
description: A symbol of confident, liberated femininity imagined by Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Perfume Creative Director, the new Miss Dior Essence expresses its intensity in a high concentration through a trail saturated by colours, with gourmand and sensual accords. Miss Dior Essence will surprise and draw you in at the same time: the succulent blackberry and elderflower accord transcends a wildly luxurious jasmine bouquet. On a base of dense, enveloping woody oak accords, this mischievous chypre resonates like a bold brushstroke on Miss Dior's floral olfactory canvas. The new Miss Dior Essence becomes the manifesto of a new generation of women freed from social conventions. Miss Dior Essence asserts itself while staying true to its original identity, reinterpreting the heritage bottle designed by Christian Dior in 1948: a frosted houndstooth motif and a black grosgrain 'poignard' bow made in France, which adorns a precious glass cap.

title: Peony & Blush Suede Cologne, 9ml
description: The essence of charm. Peonies in voluptuous bloom, exquisitely fragile. Flirtatious with the juicy bite of red apple and the opulence of jasmine, rose and gillyflower. Mingling with the sensuality of soft, blush suede. Luxurious and seductive. Fragrance notes: Red Apple, Peony, Suede. How to use: Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck and pulse points -your body heat will help to diffuse the fragrance as the day goes on. Wear alone or layer with another Cologne or your favourite Bath & Body products. Looking to find your new favourite scent in person? Visit our Jo Malone London boutiques inside selected John Lewis & Partners shops:

title: Paradoxe Eau de Parfum
description: Prada Paradoxe Eau de Parfum, the new signature fragrance by Prada. For a woman impossible to frame. Prada’s new refillable feminine fragrance is an invitation to explore and express the multiple dimensions of your identity. A celebration of being never the same, always yourself. Discover a new floral ambery fragrance that embraces the paradoxes of iconic ingredients to re-invent a feminine classic. Prada’s new Eau de Parfum opens with delicate, light, and crisp notes of Neroli, extracted just as the flower blooms to capture the bud’s freshest dimension. Amber accords sit at the heart of the fragrance to reveal a vibrant warmth and re-invented sensuality. At the base, to bring a subtly intense, long-lasting, and unforgettable depth to Paradoxe, a new musk molecule has been developed, light enough to notice right from the first spritz. Feel empowered to explore the multiple dimensions of your identity with Paradoxe by Prada. The Prada Paradoxe Collection is also refillable with our 100ml Refill Bottle. The perfect gift for yourself or treat for someone special. The iconic Paradoxe bottle: Encapsulating the very essence of Prada, the refillable Paradoxe bottle reinvents the most iconic code of the brand, the triangle logo. Tilted yet powerfully grounded, the iconic shape of the bottle is softened with rounded angles, while the delicate coral pink colour of the fragrance contrasts with the deep black Prada coat of arms. Feminine, yet disruptive. Unique, yet immediately recognisable. The Paradoxe woman, impossible to define: Prada Paradoxe Eau de Parfum, the new feminine signature fragrance for a woman impossible to frame. Our new fragrance celebrates the essential expression of femininity in all its forms. Paradoxe explores the unexpected reconciliation of contradictions to celebrate multi-dimensional self-expression and the liberation that comes with being never the same, always yourself. The Paradoxe perfumers: Master perfumers Nadège Le Garlantezec, Shyamala Maisondieu and Antoine Maisondieu collaborated with Creative Directors, Miuccia Prada and Raf Simons, to reconcile timelessness, avant-garde, and innovation. Prada embraces the paradoxes of iconic feminine ingredients to reveal the avant-garde signature of a timeless floral bouquet.

title: Pomegranate Noir Cologne, 9ml
description: Daring sensuality, encapsulated in scent. Ruby-rich juices of exotic pomegranate, with pink pepper and Casablanca lily. Warmed by temptingly smoky guaiac wood and patchouli. Key notes: Pomegranate, Casablanca Lily, Guaiac Wood. How to use: Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck and pulse points - your body heat will help to diffuse the fragrance as the day goes on. Wear alone or layer with another Cologne or your favourite Bath & Body products. Looking to find your new favourite scent in person? Visit our Jo Malone London boutiques inside selected John Lewis & Partners shops:

title: Cheirosa 59 Hair & Body Perfume Mist
description: Embrace the moment. Uplifting and delicious, this woody gourmand fragrance envelops you like the warmth of a glowing sunset. Immerse your body and mind with enticing notes of vanilla orchid, sugared violet and sheer sandalwood. Feels like connection. Fragrance notes:

title: Limited Edition Cheirosa 39 Hair & Body Perfume Mist, 90ml
description: An oceanfront view. Ripe coconuts straight from the tree. Bare feet in the sand. Cheirosa 39 Perfume Mist captures the colourful essence of 1939, when Brazilian performer Carmen Miranda showcased her signature fruit headpiece. Bold and mouthwatering, this tranquil fragrance opens with whipped coconut cream, while tropical orchid and toasted praline float on a warm breeze. Unwind in paradise. Fragrance notes: In Portuguese, 'cheirosa' means to smell incredibly delicious. How to use: Spritz from head to toe, anytime and anywhere. Tip: To heighten your cheirosa scent experience, layer with Cheirosa 40 Perfume Mist and Bom Dia Bright™ Body Cream.

title: N°5 Eau de Parfum Spray
description: N°5, the very essence of femininity. A powdery floral bouquet housed in an iconic bottle with a minimalist design. A timeless, legendary fragrance. The eau de parfum draws inspiration from the parfum with which it shares its floral aldehyde signature. This floral bouquet composed around May Rose and Jasmine features bright citrus top notes. Aldehydes create a unique presence, and the smooth touch of Vanilla an incredibly sensual trail.

title: Cologne Discovery Fragrance Gift Set
description: Find a new favourite with five trial-sized scents. Contains mellow English Pear & Freesia, flirtatious Peony & Blush Suede, fresh Wood Sage & Sea Salt, zesty Lime Basil & Mandarin and seductive Pomegranate Noir. Each can be worn solo or layered with another as a Scent Pairing. Looking to find your new favourite scent in person? Visit our Jo Malone London boutiques inside selected John Lewis & Partners shops:

title: Flowerbomb Tiger Lily Eau de Parfum
description: Flowerbomb Tiger Lily Eau de Parfum, the new Flowerbomb fragrance, is a warm solar fragrance that transports you to a summer wilderness. The perfect scent for the wild and fierce woman. A woman who roars in all her glory, fully embracing her sensual femininity. With the Flowerbomb Collection, your Flower is your Power. With Flowerbomb Tiger Lily, unleash the power of the wild Tiger lily, a symbol of confidence, to let your sensuality roar. The fragrance opens with a solar burst of coconut milk accord. At the heart lies a solar floral bouquet cantered around the exotic Tiger Lily Accord introducing a wild facet to the fragrance. An addictive Mango Accord envelops the warm Benzoin base for a burning hot sensuality. Fragrance family: Floral Ambery. Key notes: Coconut Milk Accord, Tiger Lily Accord, Mango Accord, Benzoin. How to use: Spray on skin to unleash the power of the wild Tiger Lily.

title: Jo Malone Cologne and Cologne Intense Discovery Collection Fragrance Gift Set
description: Find a new favourite with five trial-sized scents. Contains mellow English Pear & Freesia, flirtatious Peony & Blush Suede, fresh Wood Sage & Sea Salt, sensuous Myrrh & Tonka and hypnotic Oud & Bergamot. Each can be worn solo or layered with another as a Scent Pairing. 5 x 1.5ml. Looking to find your new favourite scent in person? Visit our Jo Malone London boutiques inside selected John Lewis & Partners shops:

title: Beautiful Belle Eau de Parfum
description: The fragrance. Love breaks all rules. Fall head over heels for this irreverent floral fragrance and blend of Lychee, Mimosa, Rose Petals, Orange Flower, Gardenia and Marzipan Musk. Romantic, carefree and irreverent. The Inspiration: Modern love is a journey - the first shy moments of attraction. The full-blown romance. The promise to commit forever. Deep. Forever. Beautiful. Fragrance family: Floral Amber. Fragrance notes: The Thrill: Happiness that is effervescent and contagious sparkles with notes of Lychee, Rose Petals and Mimosa. Filling the air with the beginning of love The Romance: Deep in the heart, the magic begins. Head-over-heels passion. The full-blown romance. A floral bouquet of Orange Flower, Gardenia and Tuberose. Luminous. Rich. Feminine. The Promise: A love so strong you can’t live without it. Captured in vibrant Amber notes of Orris Root, a Blush Suede Accord, Marzipan Musk and Ambrox. Sensual with a hint of irreverence.

title: Le Parfum Refillable
description: Warm, powerful, and seductive, Chloé Le Parfum is addictive without being overly sweet. A floral fragrance for women charged by a powerful and all-embracing overload of orange blossom notes intertwined with a fresh and contemporary rose. A floral explosion, alongside an accord of tonka bean and vanilla for a sensual, ambery finish. Chloé Le Parfum embodies the instinctive and true-to-self Chloé woman. Undeniably feminine and unique, the bottle of this women’s perfume features the iconic pleated glass with a burgundy ribbon tied to its neck. How to use: For a beautiful fragrance that stays on all day, delicately spray this women’s perfume onto clothing and pulse points: neck, chest, and wrists.

title: Bum Bum Summer Jet Set Bodycare Gift Set
description: Body-loving. Travel-friendly. Perfect for luscious layering and Brazilian Beauty secrets on the go. Our iconic Brazilian Bum Bum Cream for amazing skin smoothing with a hint of shimmer, our Brazilian 4 Play Shower Cream-Gel for clean, super-soft skin, and our Brazilian Crush Cheirosa '62 Hair & Body Fragrance Mist for a deeply irresistible head-to-toe scent. All infused with irresistible notes of pistachio and salted caramel. Insert card may vary from images shown.

title: J'adore Eau de Parfum
description: J’adore Eau de Parfum is the great women's floral fragrance by DIOR. A bouquet finely crafted down to the last detail, like a custom-made flower. It unites essence of Ylang-Ylang with its floral-fruity notes; essence of Damascus Rose from Turkey and blends with a rare duo of Jasmine Grandiflorum from Grasse, and Indian Sambac Jasmine with fruity and voluptuous sensuality. "J’adore is an extraordinary fragrance because it succeeds in being effortlessly seductive while boasting an original signature. Carnal, but not overbearing. This is a composition that unites contrasts, transforming iconic floral notes into an appealing, unprecedented and mysterious ensemble. J'adore invents a flower that does not exist." François Demachy, DIOR Perfumer-Creator. Olfactory description: J'adore Eau de Parfum unites the most beautiful flowers from all over the world: A closer look at Grasse Jasmine: Sun-drenched and jammy Jasmine Grandiflorum from Grasse, and Sambac Jasmine from India with its warm Orange Blossom accents, unite their strengths and differences to form a superb note: the ultimate embodiment of florality. An exceptional flower, Jasmine must be harvested at dawn, when its aroma is strongest. A moment suspended in time when, in the perfect light, Jasmine rejoices. How to use: For an intense and enhanced ritual:

title: Velvet Rose & Oud Cologne Intense, 9ml
description: Celebrating the eternal beauty and versatility of a revered flower. The iconic floralcy of Damask rose wrapped in the smoky depths of oud, sparked with clove and a delicious taste of praline. Magnetic and decadent. How to use: Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck and pulse points - your body heat will help to diffuse the fragrance as the day goes on. description: Gift:

title: Coco Mademoiselle Eau De Parfum Spray
description: The essence of a bold, free woman. An Amber fragrance with a strong personality, yet surprisingly fresh. Sparks of fresh and vibrant orange immediately awaken the senses. A clear and sensual heart reveals the transparent accords of Jasmine and Rose. The trail unfurls the pure accents of Patchouli and Vetiver that emphasise the slender structure of the composition. The eau de parfum comes in a spray format for an effortless application on skin or clothing. A complete perfuming ritual for the bath and body is also available to enhance the fragrance trail.

title: English Pear & Freesia Cologne, 9ml
description: The essence of autumn. The sensuous freshness of just-ripe pears is wrapped in a bouquet of bright white freesias, and mellowed by amber, patchouli and woods. Luscious and golden. Fragrance notes: William Pear, Freesia, Patchouli. Spritz generously onto your wrists, neck and pulse points - your body heat will help to diffuse the fragrance as the day goes on. Wear alone or layer with another Cologne or your favourite Bath & Body products. Looking to find your new favourite scent in person? Visit our Jo Malone London boutiques inside selected John Lewis & Partners shops:

title: Super Restorative Night Cream, All Skin Types, 50ml
description: New innovation for menopausal skin. The Super Restorative range is ideal for all women experiencing the effects of hormonal changes associated with menopause and has been formulated to support the skin during this stage of a woman's life. The skin is a hormone-dependent organ and the changes in hormones during peri and the start of post-menopause result in the skin becoming unbalanced. This disruption means that the skin struggles to protect itself during the day as well as reactivate itself at night. This can result in signs of ageing becoming more visible. The nourishing and revitalising formulas of Super Restorative help to fight visible changes on the skin which include dryness, skin slackening, loss of density, deep-set wrinkles, and an uneven skin tone. New research has led to Clarins’ discovery of organic harungana which has intensive replenishment and anti-ageing benefits and offers the same effect as retinol whilst being tolerated by all skin types. Organic harungana is combined with our new plant discovery, organic gorse extract, which helps improve the tone of fibroblasts by up to 89% and provides a firmer, more toned skin alongside other ingredients such as organic desert date extract, organic sea lily and vitamin C derivative. Each of the Super Restorative Day & Night creams is formulated to adapt to the skin’s chronobiology. During the day, the skin is vulnerable and needs protection and the squalane extract found in our day formulas reinforces the hydrolipidic film and protects the skin. At night, the skin needs reactivating as microcirculation slows. Organic service tree bud extract helps to stimulate the skin's microcirculation and boosts radiance. This innovative day and night duo ensure the skin's specific needs are met around the clock. The Night Cream for All Skin Types boosts the skin’s radiance thanks to the service tree bud extract.

title: Advanced Night Restore Rejuvenating Multi-Ceramide Night Cream, 50ml
description: Advanced Night Restore antioxidant cream works during the night to repair and hydrate the skin. Containing Medik8's Midnight Repair Complex, which is packed full of powerful antioxidants including dragon fruit extract, saskatoon berry and peptides to encourage cell repair throughout the night. A combination of ceramides hydrate and nourish whilst also helping to repair the skins natural defence barriers, working with potent antioxidants to neutralise damage caused by free radicals. Works well after Vitamin A and also retinol to nourish and leave the skin smooth and supple.

title: DayWear Multi-Protection Anti-Oxidant 24H Moisturiser Crème SPF 15
description: It’s the most important thing you’ll put on today. Now with our most effective anti-oxidant power ever, it defends against and diminishes the appearance of signs of premature ageing. Helps safeguard skin with an advanced broad-spectrum sunscreen and our best UVA defence. Reduces the appearance of first signs of ageing, like dullness and fine, dry lines. Skin feels smoother, looks fresher instantly. Wear Daywear and feel confident in your beautiful skin.

title: Skin Smoothing Cream
description: Dermalogica's Skin Smoothing Cream has long been our number one moisturiser. But between increasing environmental triggers and ever-busier lifestyles, the world has evolved since its creation. So we evolved its formula…Skin Smoothing Cream now features state-of-the-art Active HydraMesh Technology™, which infuses skin with 48 hours of critical moisture. A long chain Hyaluronic Acid Complex distributes moisture throughout skin’s layers to help lock in hydration, and moisturising Lecithin and Aloe Gel – along with soothing Mallow, Cucumber and Arnica - maintain the formula’s best-selling weight and texture. It also shields the skin’s beneficial bacteria from environmental stress and protects naturally occurring enzymes that facilitate healthy cell turnover. Formulated without artificial fragrances and colours. Certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny and PETA.

title: Multi-Active Day Cream SPF15, 50ml
description: De-stress your skin with Clarins Multi-Active Range, clinically proven to fight the signs of stress on your skin. Increased physical and emotional stress induced by a busy lifestyle has been proven to have a negative impact on the skin. This stress-ageing phenomenon can impact pore size*, skin firmness*, wrinkles and fine lines*, dehydration*, signs of fatigue*, luminosity**, deeper lines and skin tone**. The day and night creams are enriched with Clarins Skin Charger Complex which includes 2% niacinamide and organic sea holly extract to boost collagen synthesis, smooth fine lines, improve skin texture and reinforce the skin's resistance to prevent the further appearance of first signs of ageing. Signs of fatigue and stress are halved***: wrinkles are reduced by 1/3****, skin texture appears redefined, skin tone is more even and radiance is restored. Multi-Active Day Cream SPF 15 is a silky cream that protects against UV rays and is also enriched with teasel extract and an energising scent that has been clinically proven to reduce stress by 20%*****. *Clinical typology study commissioned by Clarins on 73 women aged 25 to 40 monitored for 6 months. **Clinical typology study on 41 women aged 35 to 50 after 5 intense days. ***Self-assessment 106 women, 28-day face application Multi-Active Day and Night All skin types. Reduction of signs visibility on a structured scale. ****Self-assessment 106 women, 28-day face application Multi-Active Day and Night All skin types. Reduction of signs visibility on a structured scale. *****index calculated from 7 stress-related items, self-assessment, France, 100 women from the first application of multi-active Emulsion.

title: Smart Clinical Repair™ Lifting Face + Neck Cream
description: Powerful face and neck anti-ageing cream moisturiser with multi-peptides and hyaluronic acid leaves skin looking more lifted, reducing the look of lines and wrinkles. Dermatologist-tested and safe for sensitive skin. Key ingredients: Multi-peptides, hyaluronic acid, jojoba oil, shea butter. Skin types: All skin types including Sensitive Skin. Benefits: Leaves skin looking more lifted, reduces the look of lines and wrinkles, hydrates the skin. What it is: The latest addition to our advanced anti-ageing skincare line, Clinique Smart Clinical Repair™, with this powerful face and neck moisturiser with a cushiony cream texture. What it does: Proven results: *Consumer testing on 132 women after 10 days of product use. **Consumer testing on 132 women after 4 weeks of product use. Formula facts:

title: Intensive Moisture Balance
description: Dermalogica's Intensive Moisture Balance is an ultra-nourishing moisturiser that restores lipid balance to dry, depleted skin for optimal barrier performance. BioReplenish Complex™ delivers a proven combination of key barrier lipids to help enhance the skin’s natural resilience and support barrier recovery. A prebiotic Chlorella Algae complex helps rebalance the skin’s natural microbiome for healthy-looking skin. Hyaluronic Acid, combined with Echinacea, Centella Asiatica and Aloe Vera, locks in hydration to help enhance the skin’s moisture content and reduce the appearance of fine lines. Formulated without artificial fragrances and colours. Certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny and PETA.

title: Super Restorative Day Cream SPF15, 50ml
description: An innovation for menopausal skin. The Super Restorative Day Cream with SPF15 protects the skin from pollutants thanks to the anti-pollution complex, protects the skin’s natural barrier with vegetal squalene and instantly smooths the skin thanks to hyaluronic acid and line-filling pearls. The addition of SPF15 helps to shield the skin from UV rays. The production of the hormone, oestrogen, is significantly impacted by the menopause which leads to a slower production process within vital skin cells, such as fibroblasts. Fibroblasts are responsible for producing collagen, elastin, and the dermal matrix - the skin’s natural bounce. It immediately leaves the skin brighter-looking and smooth. Day after day, the face is replenished, lifted, radiant, and with glowing skin. How to use: Apply to a clean face and neck each morning, warm in your hands and press outwards over the face. Over the top of your serum for best results.

Powered by renewal-boosting 4 o’clock flower, plus plant-based hyaluronic acid – alongside hydrating borage seed oil and avocado oil – this night cream reveals skin that looks radiant, refreshed and well-rested upon waking. Estée Lauder scientists discovered that Hibiscus sinensis flowers harvested early in the day hold the highest 'youth power' activity. So we gather hand-selected blooms in the morning for peak potency, then — in a process that takes 83 days from harvest to manufacture — create our extract. Exclusive Moringa Extract: Often referred to as the 'miracle tree' Moringa is one of the most effective Youth Power ingredients we’ve ever discovered. Our extract, created through an exclusive, patent-pending process, supports a powerful protein, helping skin empower multiple pathways to visible anti-ageing benefits. Cactus Stem Cell Extract and Hyaluronic Acid: Additional high-performance ingredients add to the power of Revitalizing Supreme+. An infusion of Cactus Stem Cell Extract and Hyaluronic Acid helps reveal stronger, nourished skin, saturated with 72-hour hydration. Skin’s vital moisture barrier is strengthened. Feels silky and nourishing. Absorbs quickly and melts into skin with no oily feeling. 95% said skin feels fresh and comforted—instantly.* *Consumer testing for 4 weeks on 110 women. Rich multi-action cream: firming, lifting, radiance. For all skin types. Ideal for: Formula facts:

title: Addict Lip Maximizer
description: Discover the new Dior Addict Lip Maximizer, the iconic plumping and hydrating lip gloss for instant volume-boosting shine, in an ultra-couture case. Its minty fresh effect gives the lips an addictive refreshing sensation. Upon application, the lips appear instantly and remarkably plumped. Dior Addict Lip Maximizer gloss is now available in two intensities and four finishes with a mirror shine effect– classic, intense, shimmer and holographic. *Amount calculated based on the ISO 16128-1 and ISO 16128-2 standard. Water percentage included. The remaining ingredients contribute to the formula’s performance, sensory appeal and stability. **Instrumental test on 30 subjects. How to use: Can be worn on its own for a gloss effect with mirror shine. Can be layered over the corresponding shade of Dior Addict Lip Glow for a nourished lip-volumizing makeup effect. Can be used as a primer under Dior’s bestselling Dior Addict Lip Glow Oil for the ultimate glow look. Good to know: External use on non-irritated lips only. Avoid contact with the eyes. In case of irritation other than a tingling sensation or localised heat linked to the product, discontinue use.

Moroccanoil Treatment Mist nourishes and hydrates for hair that looks and feels healthy. The premium, alcohol-free formula is easily—and instantly—absorbed by wet or dry hair. With its unique cloud-like mist, this spray will provide all of the shine and nourishment benefits of oils, without making the hair feel weighed down or leaving any greasy residue. *Based on an independent lab study.

Meanwhile, at the soul of this creation lies a treasure 80 years in the making – a prized, age-perfected oud that bestows an unequalled woody depth and aromatic intensity to the fragrance that is nothing short of extraordinary.

Plunge into the true depths of your joyful desires with this Blush now dressed in the House’s enchanting meadow of overflowing florals—a pattern brimming with nature. This blush is available in two best-selling existing shades. The formula: Versatile and playful, this multi-use blush is ultra-smooth and easy to blend, seamlessly becoming one with the skin. It delivers a long-lasting, healthy-looking flush to cheeks or eyes, infusing summer makeup looks with joyful warmth. This Gucci makeup can be effortlessly layered, from a delicate flush to a bold statement look, and everything in between. Its lightweight, silky-soft texture is formulated with emollient waxes and Gucci’s signature Black Rose Oil, offering buildable colour that intensifies seamlessly with each layer. The design and the range: Housed within a vintage-inspired floral compact case adorned with the iconic joyful Gucci Flora print, an exquisite pattern first created in 1966. The Gucci Flora Gorgeous Gardenia Blush de Beauté Limited Edition is available in two of Gucci’s best-selling shades: How to use: All shades can be used for a rush of perfect colour on cheeks and eyes. title: Style Secret Air Automatic Rotating Curler & Waver, Silver
description: Create defined styled curls, soft waves and effortless blow-dry looks with lasting results with easy automatic styling. Automatically controls and wraps the hair around the barrel for easy and fast results. Balanced heat and airflow gently heats the hair from all sides for curls that last. Combining a heat-controlled ceramic barrel and gentle airflow with 4 settings for a range of curl effects; airflow only, 170°C, 185°C and 200°C for a soft blow-dry to styled curls. 3 curl rotation settings for different results - beachy waves, natural or glam curls. 4 timer settings to create different curl formations.

description: Rouge Dior On Stage is an ultra-long-wearing and innovative Dior lipstick that delivers high-shine and vibrant colour for 24¹ hours of hydration. Housed in a bold, sleek silhouette with a custom bullet that combines the precision of a lip liner with the generous application of a lipstick. ¹Instrumental test on 30 subjects.

title: Miss Dior Essence
description: A symbol of confident, liberated femininity imagined by Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Perfume Creative Director, the new Miss Dior Essence expresses its intensity in a high concentration through a trail saturated by colours, with gourmand and sensual accords. Miss Dior Essence will surprise and draw you in at the same time: the succulent blackberry and elderflower accord transcends a wildly luxurious jasmine bouquet. On a base of dense, enveloping woody oak accords, this mischievous chypre resonates like a bold brushstroke on Miss Dior's floral olfactory canvas. The new Miss Dior Essence becomes the manifesto of a new generation of women freed from social conventions. Miss Dior Essence asserts itself while staying true to its original identity, reinterpreting the heritage bottle designed by Christian Dior in 1948: a frosted houndstooth motif and a black grosgrain 'poignard' bow made in France, which adorns a precious glass cap.
