Darlings, flip your lip look!" Charlotte Tilbury OBE. Charlotte’s life-changing lip routine for life-changing lips. 6-in-1 lip miracle, expanded: A clinically tested 6-in-1 lip solution like no other. Gently exfoliate: Apply a thin layer of Super Radiance Resurfacing Facial to clean, dry lips. Leave for 3 minutes, then rinse off with warm water! This helps remove dead skin cells to improve the absorption of the other steps in your Life Changing Lip Mask. Transform the look and feel of lips: Want hydrated, plumper, smoother-looking lips? Apply a generous, even layer of Charlotte’s Life Changing Lip Mask onto clean, dry lips! Going to sleep? Leave the nourishing mask on overnight. Going out? Follow step 4. Makeup prep: Charlotte’s Life Changing Lip Mask perfectly primes lips for makeup. To prep for makeup, leave Charlotte’s Life Changing Lip Mask on for 10 minutes, then wipe off any remaining product. Resize and reshape the look of lips with Lip Cheat lip liner, then apply your choice of lipstick.

Undeniably feminine and unique, the bottle of this women’s perfume features the iconic pleated glass with a burgundy ribbon tied to its neck. title: Airwrap Origin Hair Styler, Nickel Copper
description: The original AirwrapTM multistyler. Curl with air. Style without damage. Enhanced Coanda airflow attracts and self-wraps hair in both directions for voluminous curls or waves. Automatically redirects airflow. Projecting air in the same direction as you brush your hair. Powerful airflow quickly rough-dries hair in preparation for styling. The Dyson Digital Motor V9 spins at up to 110,000rpm. Powerful enough to produce the air pressure that creates the Coanda effect – harnessed by attachments to curl, shape and hide flyaways. Intelligent heat control measures airflow temperature over 40 times a second, controlling the heating element to keep the temperature under 150°C. Preventing extreme heat damage during styling. Three airflow speeds and three precise heat settings, including a constant Cold shot. Hair style inspiration and tips on perfecting your technique, from Dyson style experts. Find all this and more, on the MyDyson™ app.

title: AIRvive Digital Hair Dryer, Mauve
description: Get the frizz-free softness you’ll love with the REMINGTON® AIRvive™ Digital Hair Dryer. Its static-eliminating, high-speed Ionic Air Technology dries hair quickly without extreme damaging heat, whilst releasing heat-activated micro-conditioners onto your hair, for all-day frizz protection¹. The advanced digital motor spins 5x faster² to generate powerful airspeeds so that even the longest and thickest hair can be dried quickly. Plus, it's not just ultra-fast, it’s also ultra-gentle. The protective thermal sensor regulates the air temperature to protect from extreme heat, whilst the Comfort+™ setting is gentle on the scalp and helps prevent uncomfortable heat build-up while drying. The magnetic slim styling concentrator and curl-defining diffuser rotate 360° for precise styling, and the 12 heat and speed combinations mean it's built for every hair type. The 15% smaller³ and 30% lighter³ T-shape design with optimised acoustics and extra-long power cord makes it easy and comfortable to use. ¹ Shown in REMINGTON® lab testing after 24 hours ² Vs a standard REMINGTON® DC dryer ³ Vs REMINGTON® dryer AC9140

It helps keep oil and shine at bay, so you can party all night; matte blur effect all day! Shake it to wake it!" Charlotte Tilbury OBE. *Tested on 30 people. *Tested on 30 people. **Tested on 32 people. ***Tested on 30 people, 10 minutes after application. description: The perfect everyday bag, the Small Bayswater Tote has been thoughtfully constructed to ensure it can still hold all you need. To ensure you get the most out of your leather product, Mulberry recommends regular care and maintenance. Using protective leather gels and/or sprays such as Collinil Leather Gel will help to improve the water resistance of certain leathers and can help leather resist dirt and moisture. Use whenever you feel the leather needs a bit of a refresh or a just little more shine. Try to keep leather away from water and out of heavy rainfall. If it does get wet, remove any residual water immediately with paper towels, pack loosely with paper and allow the leather to dry naturally. Likewise, try to avoid keeping your product in direct heat or sunlight for prolonged periods of time as it may cause the colour to fade unevenly and unnecessarily. Marks may appear naturally on the leather surface with age and the finish may start to dull. This is a common property of leather and is just a sign of a well-loved product and its unique characteristics. Superficial marks can often be rubbed carefully with a soft cloth. Please refer to the recommended care products for further advice on surface protection. Darker-coloured leathers can transfer colour onto lighter-coloured fabrics and mark it. Dark-coloured fabric dyes (such as denim) can also transfer onto lighter-coloured leathers. Colour transfer in this way is not covered under the Mulberry Care Policy. Take extra care using products with dark-coloured suede or fabric lining, as these materials can cause the colour to transfer to lighter-coloured fabrics or objects.

description: The original go-to headphones for active music lovers are back …and better than ever. Designed to stay in place and get you moving with powerful sound, Beats Solo 4 have been re-engineered for high-fidelity acoustics, featuring personalised spatial audio with dynamic head tracking for truly immersive listening.* Their ergonomic design was developed with comfort and a secure fit in mind, in fact they’re so light you could almost forget you’re wearing them. With a compact foldable design and a soft protective case, Beats Solo 4 are built to go everywhere you do. That’s right …up to 50 hours. That’s a lot of reps. Or flights. Or calls. And if you’re low on power, Fast Fuel means charging for just ten minutes gives up to five hours of playback. Oh, and listening via the included 3.5mm audio cable doesn’t require any battery power at all.

Staying on top of your health, activity levels and overall wellbeing has never been easier, thanks to Galaxy Watch8 and Samsung Health. Google Gemini[1] is on hand to provide tips and insights to boost your fitness, and it can calculate the distance from A to B, so you can quickly plot all your runs and rides. Or if you’re planning to conquer your first 10K, then Personalised Running Coach[3] has your back, able to generate tailored training plans designed just for you. Advanced Sleep Tracking with new Bedtime Guidance[4] reveals how to maximise rest quality – even if interrupted by sporadic work shifts or crying babies – suggesting tips and insights to get you powered up for the coming day. And to treat both the mind and body equally, Galaxy Watch8 can support you with high stress alerts[5] and counteract with breathing exercises to calm a busy brain. Galaxy Watch8 is the thinnest Galaxy Watch to date, available with a 40mm or 44mm face, offering a super-sleek profile and clean-cut design. Its cushioned build takes inspiration from Galaxy Watch Ultra and offers 24-hour comfort with rounded edges, so you won’t even notice it when you’re sleeping. And when you’re on the move or working out, the tough-yet-lightweight Armour Aluminium casing will help prevent the occasional scuffs and scrapes. Under the hood, there’s a long-lasting battery able to track every step on your next weekend city break. And the latest One UI 8 update promises a smoother, more intuitive experience all round. title: Chalkboard Slow Cooker, 3.5L, Black
description: The Russell Hobbs Chalkboard Slow Cooker is a cookpot with a twist. As well as providing all the advanced and clever features that make Russell Hobbs Slow Cookers indispensable, the Chalkboard housing means you can write on it too. Whether you want to leave little notes for the family telling them what’s for dinner or you want to keep track of a recipe – this creative concept will get everyone talking. If you’re cooking for up to four people, this family-sized, 3.5-litre cooker really can make your life easier. Not only can you come home to a tasty, nutritious pre-prepared meal, but you don’t have the hassle and mess that comes with using additional pans, grills or the oven. One compact pot does the lot. The Russell Hobbs Chalkboard Slow Cooker has three simple heat settings: high, low and warm, making it easy to operate. A glass lid lets you view your food while it's cooking, and cool-touch handles on the main body make it safe to handle. Add to that its modern powder-coated finish that you can write on using chalk, and you have a thoroughly modern, versatile appliance that will enhance any home at mealtimes. The powder finish allows you to write on the sides of the pot using chalk. Leave messages for the family, tell them what’s cooking or keep a note of your ingredients or timings if you’re following a recipe. Comes complete with its own chalk to make leaving notes easier. Its generous 3.5 litre pot means it can cook a nutritious and filling meal for all the family. It has a dishwasher-safe removable pot and lid for easy cleaning after every use.

title: Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra Tablet with Bluetooth S Pen, Android, 16GB RAM, Galaxy AI, Wi-Fi, 14.6"
description: Welcome the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra, where AI brilliance meets ultra-slim elegance in an expansive display… Turn your tablet into a productivity powerhouse. Paired with the Book Cover Keyboard with AI key* you’ll be able to fly through tasks with ease thanks to a PC-like experience. With the AI key function you’ll have quick access to Google Gemini**, your integrated AI assistant. Simply chat with Gemini to start writing, brainstorming, learning, planning – faster and smarter. Built for the modern multi-tasker, the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra helps you stay organised. Jot down notes effortlessly with the redesigned S Pen, and easily turn your handwriting into text in Samsung Notes—perfect for your to-do lists or big ideas. Need to keep track of meetings or personal projects? Let Transcribe Assist*** convert your audio into text, then use Note Assist*** to instantly summarise everything into clear, easy-to-read bullet points. Wherever life takes you, Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra’s lightweight and slim design means you can seamlessly slip it into your bag and take it from sofa to the café, whether you’re commuting, traveling, or just moving from room to room. And thanks to the powerful MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ processor it’s built to do more faster, from powering through emails whilst watching content side by side on the Multi Window feature, it’s built to keep up with you. Whether you're designing a personal birthday card or just doodling for fun, simply draw with S Pen and let Drawing Assist transform your rough ideas into polished visuals - all that’s needed is your imagination. Capture some incredible travel or family moments? Enhance them effortlessly with Photo Assist**** and say goodbye to glare, blemishes, or unwanted objects in your background. And enjoy better grip and comfort with the redesigned S Pen. Experience your favourite shows like never before on an expansive 14.6” display that brings out deep contrasts and vibrant detail. Every scene stays sharp and clear thanks to the Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with an anti-reflective screen and up to 1600 nit brightness. There’s no need to worry about sudden weather shifts, as thanks to IP68***** your tablet will be protected for moments when you’re streaming content outside. Samsung’s Bluetooth S Pen has been designed to look and feel like a regular pen writing on a piece of paper, so every movement will feel totally natural. Take notes or make illustrations – the S Pen will make your writing and drawing smooth and simple. Thanks to the S Pen’s built-in Bluetooth sensor, you can control your presentations with Air Actions, and it magnetically attaches to the rear of the tablet and starts charging as soon as it connects. RAM (Random Access Memory) is different to the permanent storage provided by hard disk drives (HDD), solid state drives (SSD) or memory cards in your equipment. RAM is used by your device to temporarily store data to carry out everyday operations. The more RAM your machine has, the faster you can expect it to open and run programs. title: Borderlands 4, Xbox Series X
description: Borderlands 4 brings intense action, badass Vault Hunters, and billions of wild and deadly weapons to an all-new planet ruled by a ruthless tyrant. Crash into Kairos as one of four new Vault Hunters seeking wealth and glory. Wield powerful Action Skills, customise your build with deep skill trees, and dominate enemies with dynamic movement abilities. Break free from the oppressive Timekeeper, a ruthless dictator who dominates the masses from on high. Now a world-altering catastrophe threatens his perfect Order, unleashing Mayhem across the planet. Become an unstoppable force of battle, blasting through enemies with an all-new arsenal of outrageous weaponry. Move across the Borderlands like never before—double jumping, gliding, dodging, grappling, and more—dealing death from every direction. Explode each encounter with devastating Action Skills that unleash your Vault Hunter's unique abilities. Craft your perfect build with branching skill trees and a deep, rewarding loot chase full of wild weapons and powerful gear. Wreaking havoc across Kairos is awesome alone and even better with friends in 4-player online co-op.* Borderlands 4 is designed for co-op from the ground up; whether you're hunting for loot, tackling missions, or wandering freely, level scaling and individual difficulty keeps the party together and having fun. Freely explore a vast and dangerous world rife with warring factions. Hop on your hover bike and ride through lush fields, towering peaks, and deadly deserts full of fearsome enemies, dynamic events, and engaging quests with unforgettable characters. Unite the people of Kairos and ignite a revolution, tackling this adventure however you see fit in a seamless Borderlands experience.

title: QuietComfort Ultra (2nd Gen) Noise Cancelling Over-Ear Wireless Bluetooth Headphones with Mic/Remote
description: Bose’s superior noise cancellation for headphones with spatialised audio for more immersive listening — no matter the content or source. Premium design and luxe materials for unrivalled comfort so you can sink deeper into your favourite songs and sounds. Bose Immersive Audio pushes the boundary of what it means to listen. It spatialises what you’re hearing by taking it out of your head and placing it in front of you — putting you in the acoustic sweet spot. And with new Cinema Mode, your favourite video content comes to life in a whole new way. Connect to your preferred device, and this sophisticated feature spatialises and balances background sound and sound effects — delivering a movie-like experience wherever you go. Bose’s superior noise cancellation for headphones lets you do what you need to do, uninterrupted. The loud hum of an airplane? Annoying office chatter? TV playing in another room? Silenced. The magic of CustomTune technology: it automatically analyses your ears and adapts the sound performance of QC Ultra Headphones to their unique shape. The result? Sound that’s tailored and personalised to you. And now, with USB audio, you’ll experience crystal-clear, lossless sound that reveals every nuance — so you can hear your fave song like it’s the first time all over again. Modern, sleek, sophisticated. With a premium polish and refined metal materials, your listening experience just got more stylish. The plush cushions wrap your ears in a soft embrace while the headband evenly distributes pressure, ensuring a snug but comfortable fit all day long. QC Ultra Headphones provide up to 30 hours of play time on a single charge (up to 23 hours with Immersive Audio). Need a quick boost? A 15-minute charge gives you up to 2.5 hours of battery life (up to 2 hours with Immersive Audio).* These headphones are great at multitasking — you can charge them with your USB cord and listen to music at the same time. No more “huh?” when you’re trying to just say “hello.” Noise-rejecting mics focus on your voice and AI-based background noise suppression filter out your surroundings and wind so you can be heard and hear it all. Press to play music or answer calls. Swipe for volume control. When you take your headphones off, your content pauses automatically — just put them back on to resume where you left off. Done listening? Lay the earcups flat to disconnect Bluetooth and let your headphones hibernate until your next session. Intuitive design makes using your headphones a breeze so you’ll always be in control. Advanced Bluetooth offers a strong, continuous connection within up to 30 feet of your device. Choose single or multi-point to keep your phone, tablet, and work or school computer paired, or just focus on one. Personalise your experience even more with the Bose app. You can create a Custom Mode for every listening moment. Want to immerse yourself but not block out the world? Turn off noise cancellation and combine Aware Mode with Immersive Audio so you can hear your surroundings while enhancing and adding depth to your music. Use the Adjustable EQ settings to dial in the sound. Control bass, mid-range, and treble levels as you go. Or use the app to check battery life, customise a shortcut, and manage connected devices.

title: LA791UKT Detect XL Anti Hair Wrap Plus Vacuum Cleaner, Teal / Silver
description: Discover the power of smarter cleaning with the Shark Detect XL, designed to tackle everyday mess with ease and efficiency. Its Anti Hair Wrap Plus technology features specially engineered bristles and a clever chevron pattern that pulls in dirt, debris, and hair, guiding it to the centre of the brush-roll where anti-wrap combs actively remove it as you clean. That means no more stopping to untangle hair—just smooth, uninterrupted performance every time. At the heart of the Shark Detect XL is DuoClean Detect Technology, combining two brush-rolls with intelligent sensors that automatically adjust to deliver optimal cleaning across all floor types. Whether you're moving from carpet to hard flooring or navigating around furniture, DirectionDetect and Reverse Clean Technology sense your movement and adapt, allowing you to clean in both directions—forward and backward—for more efficient results. Plus, FloorDetect fine-tunes brush-roll speed based on the surface, ensuring a deep clean wherever you go. Designed with your well-being in mind, the Shark Detect XL features Anti-Allergen Complete Seal, which captures and traps 99.9% of dust and allergens*, helping to create a healthier home environment. Meanwhile, Anti-Odour Technology works inside the vacuum to neutralise bad smells, keeping your space fresh as you clean. Whether you're dealing with pet hair, everyday dust, or lingering odours, this vacuum is built to handle it all. With an extra-large 2.5L dust cup, you can clean more without stopping to empty, and Lift-Away Technology gives you the flexibility to transform your upright vacuum into a portable cleaner in seconds. Perfect for stairs, under furniture, above-floor surfaces, and even your car, the Shark Detect XL is your all-in-one solution for whole-home cleaning. *Based on IEC62885-2 (5.14) at 0.3 - 10 microns.

description: Sold in a pack of three, these LED capsule bulbs from Saxby are fully dimmable and compatible with most LED dimmer switches. Offering a warm white light thanks to their 3000K Kelvin rating, they have a lifetime of up to 15,000 hours. Made from clear polycarbonate with a bright nickel plate. This table is a guide to show you the equivalent bulb wattage across halogen, LED and traditional bulbs. A bulb's watt rating indicates how much energy it uses. The higher the watt, the more energy it requires. Lumens is a measure of brightness. The higher the number of lumens, the brighter the light.

title: Textured Glass Hall Pendant Ceiling Light, Antique Brass
description: Created using bespoke ribbed glass tiles, the Textured Glass Hall Pendant has a contemporary faceted look. It's complemented with warm brass-plated metal work in an antique finish and a soft gold braided cable.

title: Dakota Mini Floor Lamp, Walnut
description: The Dakota Mini Floor Lamp has a Mid-Century vibe with solid sculptural form in warm wood stain. Finished with a contrasting slubbed linen cylinder shade, contemporary fabric cable and footswitch.

title: Amelie Ribbed Glass Ceiling Light Shade
description: Attach this shade to your existing ceiling light for a vintage-style look. Made from glass with ribbed detailing that creates texture and beautifully diffuses the light. Suitable for E27/ES and B22/BC fittings.

title: Tear Drop Porcelain Easy-to-Fit Ceiling Shade, White
description: This teardrop-shaped shade works all around the home. The porcelain is a neutral white when the light is off and has a translucent light effect when the light is on. An easy-fit design that pairs perfectly with our range of classic ceiling cable sets.

title: Metal Double Arm Floor Lamp
description: We've designed this great-value floor lamp with two adjustable heads that rotate so you can direct light exactly where you need it. One head can cast light into your reading corner, while the other can work as an uplighter and fill your space with a warm glow. They're slightly oversized to give the design a more modern and playful look. Two LED bulbs are required.

title: Felix Ceramic Table Lamp
description: Mid-Century elegance comes with the Felix table lamp. Its crackle glaze reveals rustic tones and subtle linear patterns beneath the surface, highlighting the natural beauty of the ceramic body. Topped with a tall, tapered shade, Felix offers a striking silhouette that blends modern and vintage design. Great for adding character to bedside tables, consoles or reading corners. Available in different colour options to suit your style.

title: Rattan Scallop Semi Flush Ceiling Light, Natural
description: Delicate and beautifully rippled, the Rattan Scallop semi-flush ceiling light blends warm, natural woven rattan with elegant brass metalwork accents. Perfectly balancing modern and classic styles, it brings a cosy, timeless charm to bedrooms and dining spaces alike. The semi-flush design is particularly suitable for spaces with lower ceilings.

title: Elliott Floor Lamp
description: The Elliott adjustable floor lamp combines retro charm with functional flexibility. With smooth-gliding joints and a gloss-painted finish, it lets you direct light exactly where you need it. Great beside an armchair or reading nook.

title: Tate Table Lamp, Set of 2, Off White
description: The Tate is a traditional candlestick-style table lamp from Laura Ashley. This pair are ideal for the bedroom or a long console or dresser. Made of turned wood with a distressed look, the base is painted in an off-white colour with a matte finish. The look is completed with a pleated ivory tapered shade in a cotton blend.

title: Rocca Uplighter & Reading Light Double Floor Lamp
description: A tall two-light floor lamp with a double stand supporting an uplighter as well as an adjustable branch holding a reading lamp. Designed in modern metalwork with an opal glass diffuser, complete with an easy-to-reach double rotary dimmer switch. Compatible for use with LED and halogen bulbs.

title: Malcolm Marble Base Table Lamp, Coco
description: Genuine marble, with its beautiful and unique natural patterns, creates a striking look on the base of our Malcolm table lamp, finished with antique bronze metal accents. The soft cream boucle style fabric shade adds a textural contrast to this sophisticated table lamp. Designed in a versatile size that can be used all around your home.

title: Cotton Regular Fit Tartan Trim Pique Polo Shirt, Forest Green
Trindade Extra Fine Merino Wool Jumper
description: Feel confident in this fine merino wool jumper, built for smart layering and everyday comfort. The regular cut and plain crew neck provide a relaxed fit, perfect for any setting.

title: Highline Puffin Crew Neck Jumper
description: A statement-worthy crew-neck jumper with ribbed detailing at the collar, hem and cuffs.

title: Porofino Cotton Jersey Long Sleeve Polo Shirt, White
description: A polo shirt by Reiss with a classic collar and a regular fit. Crisp, comfortable cotton keeps you looking sharp from workdays to weekends.

title: Grangetown Crew Neck Wool Jumper
description: Crafted from premium wool, this crew-neck jumper is an essential layering staple for when the temperature drops. Barbour's saltire crest also serves as a timeless seal of approval.

title: Tapered Fit Cotton Denim Jeans, Blue
description: Step confidently into any day with these mid-rise tapered jeans. Crafted from 100% cotton denim, they offer comfort and flexibility, keeping up with your plans and inviting you to make your mark wherever you go.

title: Cotton Regular Fit Long Sleeve Striped Heavy Rugby Shirt, Plumped Red

description: Zip-through cardigan with a collar, two-way zip, front patch pockets and a ribbed knit on the hem and cuffs. The fabric blend includes naturally temperature-regulating lambswool with nylon, which adds softness to the yarn.

title: Made in Italy Cashmere V-Neck Jumper
description: A cashmere piece should be something you treasure. And for this classic V-neck, we've partnered with artisans in a family-run factory in Northern Italy where they dye, spin and knit our cashmere to give you a true taste of luxury. Knitted in a mid-weight gauge with a ribbed knit neck, hem and cuffs, this jumper is an all-season all-star that's even machine washable. A luxurious layer to dress up or down. Specialist cashmere spinners in Italy use their extensive expertise to twist a finer, softer, more rounded yarn, giving a deeper colour when dyed. We blend three to four different hues to make just one colour, ensuring each shade has a richness to it. Our own-brand cashmere story starts on the other side of the world, in the region stretching from northern China into Mongolia, where goats survive the harsh winter by growing an extra-fine coat underneath their weather-resistant guard hair — this is where the cashmere comes from. The cold climate and hearty lifestyle of the animals produce the longest, finest, softest fibres: some of the best cashmere in the world. Our own-brand men's cashmere is 100% Sustainable Fibre Alliance certified.

This rug has been knotted by hand, the oldest and most individual way a rug can be made. This involves an intricate process of weaving by hand on a loom where yarns are tied one at a time, giving the rug a durable construction.

title: Diamond Skye Jute Runner Rug, L240 x W70 cm, Natural

Bulrush has a fibrous tissue which makes it ideal for basket weaving. Artisans use traditional weaving techniques to create decorative yet durable pieces. Bulrush is a sustainable grass that can grow in brackish waters, to help improve soil and water quality and can be harvested year-round.

title: Addict Lip Maximizer
description: Discover the new Dior Addict Lip Maximizer, the iconic plumping and hydrating lip gloss for instant volume-boosting shine, in an ultra-couture case. Now made with 90%* natural-origin ingredients, the caring formula is infused with hyaluronic acid and nourishing cherry oil to offer spectacular shine with 24 hours** of hydration and absolute comfort. Its minty fresh effect gives the lips an addictive refreshing sensation. Upon application, the lips appear instantly and remarkably plumped. Dior Addict Lip Maximizer gloss is now available in two intensities and four finishes with a mirror shine effect– classic, intense, shimmer and holographic. *Amount calculated based on the ISO 16128-1 and ISO 16128-2 standard. Water percentage included. The remaining ingredients contribute to the formula’s performance, sensory appeal and stability. **Instrumental test on 30 subjects. How to use: Can be worn on its own for a gloss effect with mirror shine. Can be layered over the corresponding shade of Dior Addict Lip Glow for a nourished lip-volumizing makeup effect. Can be used as a primer under Dior’s bestselling Dior Addict Lip Glow Oil for the ultimate glow look. Good to know: External use on non-irritated lips only. Avoid contact with the eyes. In case of irritation other than a tingling sensation or localised heat linked to the product, discontinue use.

It is an olfactory composition with astonishing strength that explores uncharted territory. The Sauvage Elixir fragrance boldly reinterprets the iconic freshness of Sauvage by embracing a trail with new custom-crafted facets. Woody, fresh or spicy: each olfactory note of the fragrance exults, explodes, grips and engulfs. *At Dior. *Based on NPD Full Year 2024 in value.

title: Oud Zarian Eau de Parfum
description: Experience the exceptional with Oud Zarian from The House of Creed, a rare oud masterpiece that pays tribute to the patience that true artistry demands. Expertly hand-crafted using some of the most precious gifts in nature, it opens with swirls of rich, resinous frankincense veiled in warming spices, before revealing a radiant Rose Centifolia heart. Meanwhile, at the soul of this creation lies a treasure 80 years in the making – a prized, age-perfected oud that bestows an unequalled woody depth and aromatic intensity to the fragrance that is nothing short of extraordinary.

title: Miss Dior Essence
description: A symbol of confident, liberated femininity imagined by Francis Kurkdjian, Dior Perfume Creative Director, the new Miss Dior Essence expresses its intensity in a high concentration through a trail saturated by colours, with gourmand and sensual accords. Miss Dior Essence will surprise and draw you in at the same time: the succulent blackberry and elderflower accord transcends a wildly luxurious jasmine bouquet. On a base of dense, enveloping woody oak accords, this mischievous chypre resonates like a bold brushstroke on Miss Dior's floral olfactory canvas. The new Miss Dior Essence becomes the manifesto of a new generation of women freed from social conventions. Miss Dior Essence asserts itself while staying true to its original identity, reinterpreting the heritage bottle designed by Christian Dior in 1948: a frosted houndstooth motif and a black grosgrain 'poignard' bow made in France, which adorns a precious glass cap.

description: The 1st Dior Forever setting powder with a radiant matte blurring finish. Blending seamlessly into the skin, it sets and enhances the appearance of makeup for 24 hours¹ while controlling shine. Finish: Radiant matte blurring with light, buildable coverage. Like an invisible filter, it provides a perfecting soft-focus finish. Texture: A barely-there, ultra-fine powder with a no-makeup effect. Leaves skin comfortable for 24 hours.² Skincare: Infused with hyaluronic acid to help keep the skin hydrated. Shades: Six nude shades with a tone-on-tone effect. ¹Instrumental test on 25 subjects. ²Self-assessment by 25 subjects.

title: Charlotte’s Life Changing Lip Mask, Magic
description: New Charlotte’s Life Changing Lip Mask: Revive! Replump! Retexturise! A 6-in-1 miracle lip fixer by Charlotte Tilbury. "It’s immediate lip revival in a jar! Darlings, flip your lip look!" Charlotte Tilbury OBE. Charlotte’s life-changing lip routine for life-changing lips. 6-in-1 lip miracle, expanded: A clinically tested 6-in-1 lip solution like no other. Gently exfoliate: Apply a thin layer of Super Radiance Resurfacing Facial to clean, dry lips. Leave for 3 minutes, then rinse off with warm water! This helps remove dead skin cells to improve the absorption of the other steps in your Life Changing Lip Mask. Transform the look and feel of lips: Want hydrated, plumper, smoother-looking lips? Apply a generous, even layer of Charlotte’s Life Changing Lip Mask onto clean, dry lips! Going to sleep? Leave the nourishing mask on overnight. Going out? Follow step 4. Makeup prep: Charlotte’s Life Changing Lip Mask perfectly primes lips for makeup. To prep for makeup, leave Charlotte’s Life Changing Lip Mask on for 10 minutes, then wipe off any remaining product. Resize and reshape the look of lips with Lip Cheat lip liner, then apply your choice of lipstick.

title: The Mini Icons Limited Edition Skincare Gift Set
description: A trio of miniature hero products, with complementary cotton pads, to brighten and hydrate uneven skin tone. The Mini Icons Set includes three miniature sizes of some of our most-loved formulations, ideal for travel. The set also includes The Ordinary's complimentary reusable cotton pads to support the application of Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner. Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner is a water-based, exfoliating toner formulated with 7% glycolic acid, a proven alpha-hydroxy acid (AHA) that effectively exfoliates the skin. The daily surface exfoliator helps to remove dead skin cells to smooth skin texture, even tone and boost luminosity. Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% is a universal serum that balances excess oil to help prevent the appearance of blemishes. Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% heroes a high concentration of niacinamide, supported with complementary Zinc PCA, for enhanced penetration of this multi-functional ingredient. Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 is a lightweight hyaluronic acid serum that brings together five forms of hyaluronic acid to provide instant plumping hydration, while smoothing texture. The additional supporting ingredients of ceramides and pro-vitamin B5 help to restore the moisture barrier to keep hydration locked in. How to use: To use the formulations together in a regimen, after cleansing, saturate a cotton pad with Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner and apply to the face and neck. Apply Glycolic Acid 7% Exfoliating Toner once daily, ideally in the evening. After cleansing and toning, apply a few drops of Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%. Once dry, follow with a few drops of Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5.

title: Treatment Mist

Complete with both styling and conditioning benefits, Moroccanoil Treatment Mist is the ultra-lightweight foundation for all styling—a single product that creates long-lasting smoothness, increases manageability, speeds up blow-drying time, and increases shine by up to 141%*. Moroccanoil Treatment Mist nourishes and hydrates for hair that looks and feels healthy. The premium, alcohol-free formula is easily—and instantly—absorbed by wet or dry hair. With its unique cloud-like mist, this spray will provide all of the shine and nourishment benefits of oils, without making the hair feel weighed down or leaving any greasy residue. *Based on an independent lab study.

title: Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray Matte
description: Blur, mattify, smooth and set all day! Longwear. Light-as-air. Hydrates like skincare. Party all night; matte blur effect all day! "Darlings, Charlotte's award-winning, globally-loved airbrush flawless setting spray is now available in a new matte blur formula! The waterproof, light-as-air, micro-fine mist mattifies, blends and harmonises each makeup layer. "It blurs the look of pores! It blots shine instantly and over time, and it locks in your matte blur look for up to 16 hours*, no melting, no fading, no creasing! It helps keep oil and shine at bay, so you can party all night; matte blur effect all day! Shake it to wake it!" Charlotte Tilbury OBE. *Tested on 30 people. *Tested on 30 people. **Tested on 32 people. ***Tested on 30 people, 10 minutes after application. Ingredients: Results: *102 people tested after 24 hours [Group A – set makeup] **102 people tested after 24 hours (Group B – prime and set makeup). How to use: Shake it to wake it, darlings!"

title: Cashmere Gloves
description: Warm and wonderfully soft, these luxurious cashmere gloves keep the cold at bay. Plain for versatile styling, they come in one size and feature a contrasting ribbed knit on the cuff. Complete the look with the matching cashmere scarf and beanie hat. At John Lewis & Partners, we're committed to sourcing more sustainable cashmere. We work closely with our suppliers in the region stretching from northern China into Mongolia, where the extremely cold climate means the goats produce some of the best cashmere in the world. Using only the longest, finest fibres, our specialist cashmere spinners use their extensive expertise to twist a finer, softer, more rounded yarn, giving a deeper colour when dyed. Our own-brand women’s cashmere is 100% Sustainable Fibre Alliance certified. The SFA's work helps to improve the welfare of cashmere goats, protect rangelands and secure herder livelihoods. SFA certification is also an assurance that this cashmere has been processed without the use of hazardous chemicals.

At John Lewis & Partners, we're committed to sourcing more sustainable cashmere. We work closely with our suppliers in the region stretching from northern China into Mongolia, where the extremely cold climate means the goats produce some of the best cashmere in the world. Using only the longest, finest fibres, our specialist cashmere spinners use their extensive expertise to twist a finer, softer, more rounded yarn, giving a deeper colour when dyed. Our own-brand women’s cashmere is 100% Sustainable Fibre Alliance certified. The SFA's work helps to improve the welfare of cashmere goats, protect rangelands and secure herder livelihoods. SFA certification is also an assurance that this cashmere has been processed without the use of hazardous chemicals.

title: Blair Tartan Scarf
description: Woven from a soft fabric in a twill pattern with a large-scale tartan design, the beautiful Blair scarf from Barbour adds the perfect finishing touch to any outfit. Complete with a fringed hem for a pared back finish, bundle under coats and over jumpers when the temps begin to bite.

title: Leopard Print Scarf, Brown/Multi
description: Lending itself to multiple styling options, this rectangular scarf from Mint Velvet allows you to subtly indulge in the animal print trend.

title: Brambling Bucket Hat
description: This feminine take on a country-inspired hat is crafted in waxed cotton and features a tie-detail hatband trimmed in Barbour Tartan. Lined in breathable cotton, this soft hat is made with a collapsible construction that makes it ideal for popping in a pocket.

title: Animal Print Scarf, Camel
description: An animal print, rectangular-shaped, lightweight scarf.

title: Harriet Tartan Tassel Scarf, Beige/Multi
description: Transition your wardrobe into the cooler seasons with the Barbour Harriet Tartan Scarf. Crafted from a super soft fabric with tassels, this checked scarf is perfect for bundling up when the weather becomes unpredictable.

title: Kitha Check Pure Wool Scarf, Red/Multi

title: Shelley Patchwork Longline Showerproof Parka Jacket

title: Single Breasted Ponte Jacket, Black
description: Made for layering, this sleek, slimline jacket has been designed in-house and is made of a double-knit ponte fabric that has a distinctive, smooth texture and excellent stretch and recovery. Fully lined for comfortable wear, the jacket features classic tailoring details with seams to carve out your shape, notch lapels, a single welt chest pocket and two front pockets. To maintain its modernity, it has a short shape through the body, with a defining fabric-covered single button to fasten. Try it over jeans and a graphic tee to instantly refresh daytime looks or with coordinating skirts and trousers.

title: Tailored Check Print Blazer
description: A modern classic, this check blazer is tailored in Europe from soft suiting inspired by modern British tailoring - offering sharp structure with all-day comfort. Featuring subtle shaping, it layers effortlessly over knits or the matching waistcoat and trousers. A versatile staple with timeless appeal.

title: Elly Waterproof Parka Coat
description: Elly is a 100% waterproof Galon® parka. It is designed to protect you from the rain. This rain jacket has two outer pockets with button closing. The hood and sleeve ends are adjustable.

title: Everest Hooded Bomber Jacket
description: Crafted in the ideal slim fit with a faux fur trim on the hood, it s designed to go with anything you want, so it's sure to fit into your lifestyle with ease.

title: Everest Hooded Bomber Jacket, Cedar Green
description: Stay warm and stylish throughout the season with the Everest Hooded Bomber Jacket. Crafted in the ideal slim fit with a faux fur trim on the hood, it’s designed to go with anything you want, so it's sure to fit into your lifestyle with ease.

title: Single Breasted Wool Blend Coat
description: Single-breasted coat in a versatile plain design with a three-button fastening. Styled with a notch lapel, single welt pocket on the left chest and two flap welt pockets. Lined for comfortable wear, it's made from a fabric blend with naturally temperature-regulating wool for a soft hand feel.

title: Taped Seams Waterproof Raincoat, Navy Blue
Arlene Waxed Jacket, Beech/Ancient Tartan
description: Inspired by the Transport jacket, which was first introduced into Barbour's waxed jacket range in 2000, the Barbour Arlene Waxed Jacket gives this archival style a contemporary new look. Detailed with the same signature cord collar, waxed cotton composition and shorter length, the Arlene Jacket features an updated exposed chunky metal zip and large ring pull. Finished with extended rib cuffs, a reverse welt pocket, and a zipped chest pocket detail, this robust new take is great for adding an edgy look to your Barbour style.

title: Cotton Twill Jacket, Burgundy
description: Jacket made of a sturdy cotton twill fabric with a collar, two flap pockets at the chest and two handwarmer pockets. Fastens down the front with mock horn buttons.

title: Herringbone Twill Wool Blend Blazer, Brown/Multi
description: Crafted from medium-weight wool, it's the perfect choice for both day and evening occasions.

title: Ringon Open Neck Coat, Beige
description: A longline wool imbued coatigan that combines warmth and comfort with a modern open neck and practical button fastening, perfect for layering as you navigate busy days or thoughtful evenings out.

title: Everest Hooded Bomber Jacket, Varsity Red
description: In a distinct bomber style, this jacket by Superdry is designed for practicality with a built-in hood.

title: 90's Trucker Denim Jacket, Soft As Butter Mid
description: This '90s Trucker Jacket makes an outfit. You'd be hard-pressed to find a jacket with an easier shape, more versatile weight or inherent sense of cool. Bonus: This throwback cut features a pitched silhouette for a distinctly 90s feel.

title: Wool Blend Funnel Neck Houndstooth Jacket, Brown/Multi
description: Classic John Lewis Funnel Neck Jacket. Made with a wool short length, and a checkered print all-over.

title: Estate Country Liner Jacket, Eclipse Navy
description: The Estate Country Liner Jacket embodies simplicity and luxury perfectly. Designed with a DWR coating and a boxy fit, the silhouette is both stylish and practical, while the subtle metal finishes elevate the jacket from a necessary layer to a desired styling piece.

title: Beadnell Wax Jacket, Brown
description: Regular in fit and lined for comfort, this waxed coat keeps you warm and dry on casual winter days. A smart collar and button closure add a touch of refinement, ideal for when you need reliability and practicality in unpredictable weather.

title: Fuji Faux Fur Hood Mid Length Coat, Black
description: The Fuji jacket at mid-length is designed to be your perfect companion throughout the transitional months. This versatile piece has only your comfort in mind with its endless changeability, matching the nature of the various temperatures we encounter. It is function-focused, with its hood being completely detachable or adjustable with bungee cords, while the slightly slimmer fit enables a flattering look.

title: Origin II Unisex Packable Waterproof Jacket
description: Origin II is Mac in a Sac's signature jacket. Developed to protect you in all weather, regulate your temperature and be adjustable for all conditions. Lightweight, packable and easily stored, you’ll be prepared for variable weather and ready for a challenge. With a solid, functional look designed for the outdoors you’ll feel ready and energised for your adventure - whatever the weather.

title: Beadnell Waxed Jacket
description: A Barbour classic, the stylish medium-weight Beadnell jacket offers a heritage-inspired tartan lining, engraved branded studs, a cord textured collar and a relaxed, easy fit. Stylish and practical, with a studded throat strap, two handwarmer pockets, two studded pockets and stitched Barbour branding for the most authentic country-to-town layer.

title: Short Funnel Neck Wool Blend Jacket
description: Soft, warm wool-blend jacket with a funnel neck. The asymmetrical short wrap front seals in warmth with button details at the neck echoed on the cuffs. Made using recycled materials, helping us to reduce our impact on the planet.

title: Goldie Colour Block Pleated Midi Skirt, Navy/Ivory
description: Carved to a pleated A-line, this midi skirt from Reiss is brought to life with colour blocking and fastens smoothly with a zip.

title: Faux Leather Bomber Jacket, Chocolate
description: The style of the season, this classic relaxed-fitting bomber jacket is crafted from soft faux leather. Boasting the signature boxy look, this jacket features a classic collar, kangaroo patch pockets, and convenient popper fastening. The self-covered elastic cuffs and hem add a touch of comfort and style, making it a versatile choice. Fully lined for extra warmth and sophistication as the seasons change.

title: Statement Zip Run Trainers, Grey
description: Carvela runner trainers blend sharp style and comfort, with embellished accents. With flat soles, a closed round toe and easy zip, they're ready for whatever plans you create - supportive, practical, and suited for your day-to-day pace.

title: Argyle Check Print V-Neck Tank Top
description: This Argyle knitted button tank top is a versatile addition to any wardrobe. The V-neck and extended shoulders create a flattering silhouette, while the mock horn buttons add a touch of elegance. Made from a wool blend, this tank top is warm and comfortable. Perfect for layering or wearing on its own.

title: Cotton Aviator Field Jacket, Navy
description: This classic aviator field jacket from Ralph Lauren is crafted from pure cotton, and showcases a high collar, zip and press-stud fastening, two chest pockets and two front patch pockets. Finished with an interior welt pocket to the left. Fully lined.

title: x John Lewis Small Bayswater Leather Tote Bag
description: The perfect everyday bag, the Small Bayswater Tote has been thoughtfully constructed to ensure it can still hold all you need. A popper-adjusted gusset increases the volume, and the leather handles can be shortened or lengthened as desired. Finished with one internal slip pocket. To ensure you get the most out of your leather product, Mulberry recommends regular care and maintenance. Using protective leather gels and/or sprays such as Collinil Leather Gel will help to improve the water resistance of certain leathers and can help leather resist dirt and moisture. Use whenever you feel the leather needs a bit of a refresh or a just little more shine. Try to keep leather away from water and out of heavy rainfall. If it does get wet, remove any residual water immediately with paper towels, pack loosely with paper and allow the leather to dry naturally. Likewise, try to avoid keeping your product in direct heat or sunlight for prolonged periods of time as it may cause the colour to fade unevenly and unnecessarily. Marks may appear naturally on the leather surface with age and the finish may start to dull. This is a common property of leather and is just a sign of a well-loved product and its unique characteristics. Superficial marks can often be rubbed carefully with a soft cloth. Please refer to the recommended care products for further advice on surface protection. Darker-coloured leathers can transfer colour onto lighter-coloured fabrics and mark it. Dark-coloured fabric dyes (such as denim) can also transfer onto lighter-coloured leathers. Colour transfer in this way is not covered under the Mulberry Care Policy. Take extra care using products with dark-coloured suede or fabric lining, as these materials can cause the colour to transfer to lighter-coloured fabrics or objects.

description: Turn heads at evening events in this petite maxi dress. Its straight silhouette and keyhole back add clever detail, while the soft velvet blend and round neck make you feel comfortable and polished all night.

title: Fuoco Faux Leather Jacket, Olive Green

title: Edge to Edge Alpaca Wool Blend Cardigan
description: Our Edge to Edge cardigan includes super-soft alpaca and wool in the fabric blend. Draping loosely over the body with a relaxed fit and open neckline, it's sure to be a staple layer for your wardrobe. The John Lewis style philosophy focuses on individuality, colour and versatility. Each piece is designed to work together and with your existing wardrobe. Designed in-house, the collection features contemporary clothing and accessories with strong, clean lines. Every season, our designers create distinct colour groups that include both the building blocks of every wardrobe and vibrant stand-out pieces that add a finishing touch. Empower your personal style and mix, match, tone and clash. It's how you wear it.

description: Freshening up your wardrobe, this pair of trainers by Saucony is made with leather blended uppers for long-lasting quality. Set on a flat heel, they have a rounded toe for everyday charm.

description: Bringing a summery vibe to your wardrobe, this pair of narrow fit sandals from Birkenstock is made from nubuck for a soft yet durable quality. Set on a flat heel, they pair well with midi skirts and dresses for effortless smart-casual ensembles.

title: Foza Leather Knee High Tall Boots
description: Elevate your style with Foza the tall biker boot. Crafted in Italy from supple leather and impeccable Italian craftmanship, creating a rugged look with standout design edge. Foza includes a removable leather insole.

title: Jaliz Wide Fit Leather Block Heeled Sandals
description: With their open-toe design and almond-shaped toe, Jaliz is a style that truly stands out. The adjustable buckle ensures a customised fit, while the sturdy block heel adds height and support. From workdays to weekend outings, these versatile shoes enhance every outfit, making them a must-have addition to your footwear. Heel height: 6.5cm

title: Edison Leather Trainers
description: Our plain white Edison trainers have been elevated into an athleisure must-have with the addition of a contrast rubber sole. Made in Portugal for us in leather, the trainers feature lace-up detailing and a zipper that not only looks good but makes putting them on very speedy - no messing with laces. The chunky flatform sole offers a contemporary finish. John Lewis & Partners introduces a new style philosophy focused on individuality, colour and versatility. Each piece is designed to work together and with your existing wardrobe. Designed in-house, the collection features contemporary clothing and accessories with strong, clean lines. Every season, our designers create distinct colour groups that include both the building blocks of every wardrobe and vibrant stand-out pieces that add a finishing touch. Empower your personal style and mix, match, tone and clash. John Lewis & Partners: it’s how you wear it.

title: Le Pliage Original Large Shoulder Bag
description: Inspired by the neat folds of origami, Le Pliage from Longchamp delivers practical simplicity to a sleek everyday style. The light, foldaway bag has become recognisable worldwide. Dimensions: 31cm (L - measured at the base of the bag) x 30cm (H) x 19cm (W). Offered in an array of shapes, sizes and colours, Le Pliage is designed to be light as a feather with sturdy durability and can fold away with ease. Featuring long shoulder straps for comfort and a spacious compartment to store everything you need from documents to your laptop, this piece is one to keep with you. Minimalist in silhouette, fill it with your necessities or fold it down to the size of a paperback and simply unfold when you need it.

title: Popette Soft Camera Bag, Blue
description: Combining a soft, rounded design with luxe hardware detailing, this camera bag is a modern essential for your accessories collection.

title: Leather Camera Bag, Chocolate
description: This timeless camera bag is perfect for all occasions, taking you stylishly from day to night. Made in Italy from supple grained pebble leather, the bag is fully lined and features gold hardware with a stylish leather tassel. Wear on the shoulder or across the body, this handbag will easily accommodate a purse, keys, mobile phone and cosmetics. The stylish bag is delivered in a branded dust bag and includes two detachable and fully adjustable straps in co-ordinating leather and a stunning lemon cheetah woven design.

title: Deliberate XL Woven Shoulder Bag
description: Elevate your everyday edit with Dune's Deliberate XL shoulder bag, designed in an extra-large size. This woven profile features a removable shoulder strap for versatile styling, a magnetic closure and an optional zip-pouch for organised storage.

title: Popette Soft Camera Bag, Black
description: Combining a soft, rounded design with luxe hardware detailing, this camera bag is a modern essential for your accessories collection.

title: x John Lewis Small Bayswater Leather Tote Bag
description: The perfect everyday bag, the Small Bayswater Tote has been thoughtfully constructed to ensure it can still hold all you need. A popper-adjusted gusset increases the volume, and the leather handles can be shortened or lengthened as desired. Finished with one internal slip pocket. To ensure you get the most out of your leather product, Mulberry recommends regular care and maintenance. Using protective leather gels and/or sprays such as Collinil Leather Gel will help to improve the water resistance of certain leathers and can help leather resist dirt and moisture. Use whenever you feel the leather needs a bit of a refresh or a just little more shine. Try to keep leather away from water and out of heavy rainfall. If it does get wet, remove any residual water immediately with paper towels, pack loosely with paper and allow the leather to dry naturally. Likewise, try to avoid keeping your product in direct heat or sunlight for prolonged periods of time as it may cause the colour to fade unevenly and unnecessarily. Marks may appear naturally on the leather surface with age and the finish may start to dull. This is a common property of leather and is just a sign of a well-loved product and its unique characteristics. Superficial marks can often be rubbed carefully with a soft cloth. Please refer to the recommended care products for further advice on surface protection. Darker-coloured leathers can transfer colour onto lighter-coloured fabrics and mark it. Dark-coloured fabric dyes (such as denim) can also transfer onto lighter-coloured leathers. Colour transfer in this way is not covered under the Mulberry Care Policy. Take extra care using products with dark-coloured suede or fabric lining, as these materials can cause the colour to transfer to lighter-coloured fabrics or objects.

description: The Romilly pays homage to an archived Radley handbag, one with the same soft folded construction and three interior compartments. Choose between its two personalities; leave the long zip pullers hanging loose for casual style, or tuck them in to see it look poised and sophisticated. Designed with grab handles, a detachable and adjustable wide strap, centre zipped section, and interior pocket. Fits a 13” laptop. Comes with a dust bag.

description: This ultra-lightweight backpack, made from durable, foldable recycled nylon canvas, is ideal for any occasion. The versatile, all-purpose design features a spacious interior capable of storing a 16-inch laptop, while the wide shoulder straps ensure a comfortable fit. This backpack is a high-energy, contemporary design, with a contrasting Russian leather flap and a Longchamp medal, all signature details synonymous with an active lifestyle.

title: Foldaway Pouch Bag
description: Be ready for those last minute purchases with our black Foldaway Pouch Bag. A generous size, this bag is made from recycled plastic making it very easy to clean and the handles are long enough to wear on the back of your shoulders.

description: Our weaved clutch bag comes in a range of exciting colours that will add personality to your occasion outfit. The gusseted design makes it easy for you to get what you need, whilst the slip pocket helps to keep things organised. The bag is finished with a gold-toned metal chain for hands-free convenience that can be stowed inside if not required. description: Crafted with durable nylon and designed with sumptuous faux-leather straps, the medium Keaton tote features a spacious silhouette, perfect for carrying the day’s essentials. A versatile must-have, it’s finished with an “LRL” metal logo at the front for signature style.

description: This month pouch from Katie Loxton features a vegan leather material and a zip pull which is embellished with a real semi-precious stone. Complete with their signature gold-tone details, showcasing the months unique personality traits.

description: Inspired by the neat folds of origami, Le Pliage from Longchamp delivers practical simplicity to a sleek everyday style. The light, foldaway bag has become recognisable worldwide. Featuring top handles for grab-and-go appeal, this mini piece is one to keep with you - fill it with your necessities or fold it down to the size of a paperback and simply unfold when you need it.

description: Keep everything secure in style with this small zipped wallet, which features a full zip closure, six card slip pockets and two gusseted compartments. title: Le Pliage Green Recycled Canvas Large Tote Bag, Graphite
description: Subtle, refined design with a zipper closure, this travel bag keeps all of your personal belongings protected and can even be folded up when it’s not being used. Longchamp drew its inspiration from origami when creating Le Pliage, a light, foldaway bag that has since become a cult object worldwide. The Pliage Green line is made with recycled polyamide canvas. The bag follows strong codes, like the horse embroidery, and has tone-on-tone Russian leather trimmings characteristic of Longchamp.

title: Columbus Contrast Stitch Jeans, Dark Blue
description: Made in thick cotton denim with contrast stitching. Concealed zip fastening with button at waist. Two slanted pockets at the front and two pockets at the back. Press pleats down legs. Shiny silver hardware. Mid-high waist with wide, straight legs.

title: Linen Blend Vera Shell Top, Washed Black
description: The underrated benefit of owning a co-ord set? As well as being able to create a head-to-toe look with the matching trousers, HUSH's Vera top looks just as good with stuff you already own. It's also made in a breezy linen blend, and the away-from-the-body shape means there's plenty of natural airflow.

title: Bianca Wide Leg Trousers, Coral
description: Perfectly tailored to a streamlined brief, this pair of trousers by Phase Eight sit high on the hips and come in a wide-leg cut. Light and fluid in a blended viscose fabric, they may be plain in print, but are front-seat worthy.

title: Nina Overshirt, Twill Sand Storm
description: With its oversized fit, the Nina Overshirt combines bold style with easy comfort. This version is made from beige Comfort Twill, soft cotton with a touch of stretch. Wear it open, over a white tee, with jeans in a coordinating colour.

title: Boel Painter Denim Midi Skirt, Dark Blue
description: Boel is a high-waisted, regular-fit denim skirt with a tall silhouette and a flattering fit, designed with a front slit for easy movement. Crafted from Nudie Jeans's Painter Denim, a deeply saturated pure indigo 2/1 denim, Boel is stitched with contrasting off-white thread that delivers an authentic vintage workwear aesthetic. The rinse wash softens the rigid denim, enhancing comfort while maintaining the rich, deep mid-blue shade. A truly vintage-inspired workwear denim reimagined in a modern fit.

title: Columbus Reversible Trench Jacket, Dark Blue Denim
description: The jacket is made in faux leather with soft, shearling texture on the other side. Featuring a three-button fastening and two patch pockets. No shoulder seam and long sleeves. Straight, regular fit.

title: Lina Short Sleeve Painter Denim Shirt, Dark Blue
description: Lina is a short-sleeved denim shirt with regular fit and clean, straight cut. It features a patch-on chest pocket and side seam slits. Crafted from Nudie Jeans's Painter Denim, a deeply saturated pure indigo 2/1 denim, Lina is stitched with contrasting off-white thread that delivers an authentic vintage workwear aesthetic. The rinse wash softens the rigid denim, enhancing comfort while maintaining the rich, deep mid-blue shade. A truly vintage-inspired workwear denim reimagined in a modern fit.

title: Geometric Print Front Knot Cropped Vest Top
description: Love an easy styling hack? With the Hush sleeveless crop top, there's no need for gimmicks. Featuring a pre-tied knot at the front, looking effortless is that little bit easier. Crafted with bra-friendly straps and a mesmerizing geometric print all over, perfect for pairing with the matching trousers or jeans for a casual fit.

title: Rivello Trousers
description: Discover the benefits of relaxed tailoring with ASCENO's Rivello trousers, a pleated design with a flat waistband and discreet side-slip pockets. This offering is also cut from breathable linen to provide all-day comfort.

title: Crepe Boyfriend Blazer
description: Elevating your look with ease, this blazer from Whistles sits at the hips for practical coverage. Detailed with a collar, it is fashioned from long-lasting fabric that will see away the cold.

title: Valera Linen Jacket
description: ASCENO's Valera jacket is a lightweight piece cut from soft and breathable linen. It is another example of the brand's relaxed tailoring and includes two utility-inspired front pockets.

title: Lindsey Linen Blend Double Breasted Suit Blazer
description: Carefully sketched to a sharp silhouette, this blazer from Whistles sits at the hip for versatile coverage. Detailed with a collar, it is made from a comfortable linen blend for a soft breathable feel.

title: Ripley Sparkle Shorts, Black
description: Designed with metallic thread detailing, the Ripley shorts are embellished by velvet ribbon and chain detailing to create a statement style.

title: Lindsey Linen Blend Wide Leg Trousers
description: Tailored to flatter your profile, this pair of trousers from Whistles sit naturally on the hips and come in a wide-leg cut. Soft and lightweight in a blended linen fabric, they allow you to experiment with accessories and prints thanks to their plain design.

title: Satin Lace Trim Midi Skirt, Black
description: Cut to a slip shape with a lace trim asymmetric hemline, this midi skirt from Whistles is minimally detailed for endless wearability. Made from satin, it's sure to become one of your favourite choices in your everyday rotation.

title: Satin Lace Trim Cami
description: Simple and versatile in nature, this lace trim cami by Whistles is made from satin. Try glamming it up with the matching skirt when cocktail hour comes around.

title: Bonnie Barrel-Leg Trousers, Twill Sand Storm
description: The Bonnie Trouser is defined by a barrel-leg fit. This fashion-forward style has a mid-rise, designed to be worn a little lower on the waist, and a full-length inseam, all rendered in dark-beige Comfort Twill. Style yours with heels to show off the curved silhouette.[?

title: Kamila Colour Block Skirt, Black/Multi
Linen Blend Petunia Wide Leg Trousers
description: Trousers that feel like PJs, but look good enough to wear all the time? Our Petunia trousers pass the vibe check, designed in a swishy wide-leg fit with a comfy elasticated waistband for comfort. We've mixed linen with viscose so they're more drapey (less crunchy) and we love how easy they are to mix and match with our summer tops from last year.

title: Adrina Metallic Trousers, Silver
description: Designed in a metallic hue, the Adrina trousers are the perfect contemporary style for your next event. Featuring delicate pleating and falls to a wide leg silhouette. Made using recycled materials, helping us to reduce our impact on the planet.

title: The Dasha T-Shirt, Cream
description: The Dasha Top - your new everyday staple. Crafted from recycled viscose, the fabric has a heavier weight with a slight stretch, making it perfect for a relaxed everyday option. Pair it with a jogging trouser to complete your chic loungewear edit.

title: Olive Denim Midi Skirt, Black
description: A timeless silhouette for a reason, Olive is the kind of midi skirt you'll find yourself wearing on-repeat all year. A-line in a softly structured cotton, she has a delicate pleated detail at the waist and cheeky front slit to show a bit of leg.

title: Rita Luxe Sateen Blazer, Sage Green
description: A smart outerwear piece that will pull any look together, this blazer from Whistles sits at the hip for versatile coverage. Featuring a neat collared neckline, it provides lightweight with its smooth blended fabric.

title: Elsie Wool Blend Jacket, Grey
description: Fusing a flattering tailored fit and a warm, wool blend, the Elsie jacket is a staple for seasonal tailoring.

title: Matilda Cotton Raglan Top
description: HUSH's Matilda top is one of those great styling basics everyone should have (at least one of) in their wardrobe. Pure cotton means it's soft and breathable, so we can wear it now with denim shorts as well as later in the season with wide-leg trousers. As always, HUSH have kept the shape pretty casual by opting for relaxed raglan sleeves.

title: Carla Relaxed Tank Top
description: The Carla tank gives us that laid-back look we love without us even trying. It's all down to the relaxed fit, meaning it hangs away from the body for a looser, more effortless feel. We think it's a hero piece in a more unconventional way - wear it solo now, layered later.

title: Daisy Broderie Shirt, Blue
description: This little piece of sunshine is the perfect shirt to pair with denim this season. Crafted from broderie cotton, with a daisy design. The frill on the collar complements the pretty design, with fluted sleeves.

title: Sutton Sleeveless Drape Rib Top
description: The perfect top to add to your capsule wardrobe. With feminine draping at the neckline, this sleeveless style is versatile enough for both work and drinks with friends.

title: Henley Ribbed Long Sleeve Top, White
Sienna Cotton Shirt, Oxford Blue
description: Crisp cotton keeps the straight-fitting shape of the Sienna shirt. It has a curved hem at the back for easy layering.

title: Ultimate Cotton T-Shirt, White
description: The foundation to all your looks, this t-shirt from Mint Velvet is free-from-fuss for timeless appeal. Framed with a neat crew neckline and short sleeves, it's made from soft cotton and is ideal for relaxed daytime wear.

title: Willa Organic Cotton V-Neck Cap Sleeve T-Shirt
description: For the casual everyday, this t-shirt from Whistles is plain for easy mixing and matching. Cut with a classic v-neck and cap sleeves, it is made from soft and breathable organic cotton and is ideal for relaxed daytime wear.

title: Ellie Organic Cotton Shirt
description: An effortless choice, this blouse from White Stuff is dotted with spots. Framed with a collar and short sleeves, it is made from organic cotton for comfortable wear and will slot seamlessly into your everyday staples.

title: Snap Collar Sweatshirt, Crisp Pink
description: Featuring a standout snap neckline and soft, structured fit.

title: Katya Stripe Shirt, White Self Stripe
Sophie Organic Cotton Shirt, Blue
Whitney Ruffle Top, White
Nelly Notch Neck T-Shirt
description: A solo piece or layering staple, this t-shirt by White Stuff is plain for easy mixing and matching. Framed with a v-neckline and short sleeves, it's made from soft and breathable cotton and is an everyday wardrobe essential.

title: Snao Polar Fleece
description: Bold colour blocking, snap collar sass, and year-round comfort.

title: Organic Cotton Oversized V-Neck T-Shirt
description: Soft cotton T-shirt with a V-neckline and modern oversized fit. Pairs easily with denim or joggers. Made with organic cotton and also Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) certified. This assures that high social and environmental standards of manufacture have been met across the entire textile supply chain.

title: Lauren Ralph Lauren Judy Boat Neck Top
description: Versatile and effortlessly stylish, this slim fit top from Lauren Ralph Lauren will make a shrewd addition to your smart/casual wardrobe. Crafted from a stretchy cotton fabric, this must-have design boasts elbow-length with fold-over cuffs, a flattering boat neckline and the brand's signature logo embroidered just above the right hem. Style with tailored trousers and knee high boots for a chic off-duty profile. Size medium has a 25" body length, a 33.5" bust, and an 11.25" sleeve length.

title: Super Soft Boat Neck T-Shirt
description: Playing with silhouette brings renewed interest to everyday basics. This soft cotton-modal blend tee is cut for a slim fit with a flattering boat neck. Wear it with jeans or layered under a denim jacket.

title: Turn Up Sleeve Tank T-Shirt
Clover Pure Linen Blouse, Blue
description: Smart summer-proofs. Whisked from breezy, lightweight linen, this blouse features a sharp collar, open front and full length sleeves. Finished with a single pearly button for a touch of opulence to this chic, simple style.

title: Organic Cotton Long Sleeve Crew Neck T-Shirt
description: Basics don't have to be boring. That's why we used super-soft organic cotton to design this easy long-sleeved crew neck T-shirt for our collection. Versatile and comfortable, it's meant to fit easily into your wardrobe as a staple layer for every day, giving you the assurance that it'll stay robust yet soft day after day, wash after wash. Our style philosophy focuses on individuality, colour and versatility. Each piece is designed to work together and with your existing wardrobe. Designed in-house, the collection features contemporary clothing and accessories with strong, clean lines. Every season, our designers create distinct colour groups that include both the building blocks of every wardrobe and vibrant stand-out pieces that add a finishing touch. Organic cotton is grown without the use of chemicals such as fertilisers and pesticides, helping to support healthier and more sustainable farming practices.

title: Cotton Extended Shoulder T-Shirt
description: For the casual every day, this t-shirt from Mint Velvet will give your wardrobe the refresh it needs. Keeping it classic with a crew neck and short sleeves, it's made from soft cotton and will slot seamlessly into your everyday staples.

title: Ponte Slim Fit Trousers, Black
description: Take your smart office wear to the next level with these John Lewis ponte trousers. These mid-rise tailored trousers are cut to a modern slim fit. LENZING™ ECOVERO™ fibres used in this product are extracted from sustainable wood pulp and are produced through an environmentally responsible production fibre process.

title: Straight Full Length Leggings, Black
description: Cotton-rich leggings with a wide waistband and full-length hemlines.

title: Straight Leg Tailored Trousers, Black
description: Trousers tailored with a stretch leg and made with a touch of stretch in the fabric for comfort. Styled with belt loops and a concealed zip fly. Pair with the matching blazer for office wear.

title: Wide Waistband Straight Leggings, Black
description: A pair of leggings with a wide waistband and full-length hemline.

title: Essential Cotton Leggings
Alyna Pocket Joggers
description: We're heading towards comfy season, and our Alyna joggers have our name written all over them. They're the perfect do-it-all pair, whether we're running errands on the weekend or picking up our daily coffee. We've kept the fit nice and relaxed (because that's what we plan on doing in them) and given them nice deep pockets.

title: Stretch Waistband Ponte Trousers, Black
description: A pair of trousers that goes with anything for work or weekend alike? In a stretchy ponte fabric with a comfy stretch waistband, these are a true wardrobe wonder. LENZING™ ECOVERO™ fibres used in this product are extracted from sustainable wood pulp and are produced through an environmentally responsible production fibre process.

title: Petite Rae Tailored Trousers, Black
description: Master weekday solutions with the Rae trousers. Cut in a contemporary straight leg, layer with bold blouses and blazer jacket.

title: Kate Cropped Tailored Trousers, Chocolate Torte
description: A pair of regular fit trousers by ICHI. They feature a mid rise with a zip fly and cropped hems.

title: Curve Jersey Regular Length Leggings, Black
description: The go-to for wearing with tops, tees and fine knits alike, this pair of jeggings from Live Unlimited sit naturally on the hips and are cut to a skinny fit. Made from a fabric blended with cotton to enhance breathability, they play nicely with print thanks to their plain canvas.

title: Pleat Wide Leg Trousers, Navy
description: Wide-leg plain trousers with pleated details on the leg. Made with belt loops and a concealed zip fly.

title: Amie Joggers
description: Our day-through-to-evening Amie joggers are so versatile, we'll openly admit to owning a pair in every colour. Tapering towards the ankle, they're finished with zipped cuffs so you can adjust the fit and a comfy drawstring waist. Make them office appropriate by adding a softly tailored jacket and slip-on loafers, swapping for T-shirts and trainers come weekend.

title: Belgravia Wide Leg Tailored Trousers, Deep Wisteria
description: Confidence starts in the stance with this pair of wide-leg trousers by Boden. They feature a mid rise with a zip fly and hems that are fall past the ankle.

title: Mid Rise Corduroy Culottes, Black
description: Cotton corduroy takes centre in these free-flowing culottes.

title: Contour Waist Straight Trousers, Black
description: A pair of modern, slim-fit trousers from Sosandar with a high-rise contour waist and contrast buttons.

title: Flared Corduroy Trousers
description: Corduroy trousers with a retro-inspired flared leg and classic five-pocket styling with metallic rivets and single button and zip fly fastening.

title: Jersey Cropped Trousers
description: Exaggerated volume meets unapologetic flair with these wide-leg culottes by Mango with a cotton blended base. They are designed to sit mid rise and fall to a neatly cropped hem.

title: Palazzo Wide Leg Trousers, Black
description: A pair of trousers in a high waisted silhouette featuring darted front, contrast trim side pockets, full length wide hemlines and an elastciated waistband.

title: Faux Leather Leggings, Black
description: These black leggings from Mint Velvet are cut from sculpting faux leather that's supple enough to tuck you in but stretchy enough to wear comfortably all day. The wide waistband makes them especially flattering - wear yours with anything from a blouse to a t-shirt.

title: Amie Wide Leg Joggers
description: Something about slipping on our Amie wide-leg joggers makes us feel instantly more put-together. It could be down to the way they swish as we walk, or it might be thanks to the wide waistband which creates a flattering fit. Either way, you'll see us wearing them on repeat this season and well into the next.

title: Lya Wool Blend Wide Leg Trousers
description: No-fuss tailoring? We've got you. HUSH have adapted their bestselling Lya fit to create these gorgeous wide-leg trousers, tweaking the pleat detailing to the front for a more flattering finish. We love that they're made from a premium Italian wool blend too, so we can wear them well into the cooler months.

title: Pull On Slim Fit Tailored Trousers
